name: Alyson Antolick
text: Was not notified of cancelled delivery until 2 hours after expected. Although I was given a call day of at 730am to let me know it would be delivered that day. Reason for cancellation was "didn't have enough drivers" which to me you should line up drivers BEFORE setting your schedule. Seems like common sense to me, but I guess that's hard to find with Henderson Transfer and Storage. No thanks.

name: DR J.L. Phillips
text: They were polite but unable to help me. Thank you all the same.

name: Jessica Martin
text: I bought some furniture from wayfair and this company delivered and assembled it. They were very nice and did a great job. They were quick. The only bummer is that I was told they'd be here at 3 but didn't come until 6ish. I had to waste my day waiting but things happen I suppose. I would definitely use them again.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Jessica, we really appreciate it!

name: Maria Whitten
text: Excellent service, delivery on Saturday and very punctual.

name: Ashley Curtis
text:
Our experience with this company had both its’ ups and downs. They called us on a Friday to say our furniture could be delivered Monday.  In the voicemail, the company rep kept calling my husband Michelle, when his name is Michael. When she realized halfway through the message that she made a mistake, she said’ “I think it’s supposed to be Michael and not Michelle...anyway...” No apology or anything. When we called to reschedule because we were out of town, the same rep said she would call us back with a new time and day. She never did. We called three times before actually getting someone on the phone. Same rep informed us it would be delivered Tuesday at 12/ noon. Okay. Great. So, Tuesday at noon rolls around, and no one is here. We waited until 1:30 before calling to check the status, to which we got nothing but the voicemail multiple times. When my husband finally got someone on the phone, the same rep informed us that our furniture was scheduled for delivery on Wednesday, not Tuesday. Clearly my husband was upset since we rearranged our schedules and paid extra to keep my daughter in daycare. So, she says our furniture will be delivered Wednesday at 12. Because we had issues with times, I decided to call to make sure it was set for 12, and the same rep, very rudely, began arguing with me about what she said the day before and the times. I was trying to get an estimated time, and she kept interrupting me, and she finally hung up. At this time, I was livid with the situation and called back. Here’s where the actual good part comes in. Said rep hands the phone to the company owner, who was extremely helpful. He listened without interrupting and sympathized with the situation. He informed me that delivery times are always approximately due to problems or delays with other scheduled deliveries and we would see our furniture between 12-4 on Wednesday. It was delivered before 12 the next day in great condition.

The reason why I am giving this company a 2 star instead of higher is solely bc of the rude and unprofessional receptionist.  She independently will run the company into the ground if she continues to act with other clients the way she did with us. I believe this company is a “mom and pop” family business, so I doubt she’ll be going anywhere. For future clients, be ready to deal with inconsistentency and an argumentative receptionist.

name: Bowbee Outdoors
text: No show for scheduled delivery. No notice, nothing. Now i have a empty living room until they deliver. Who knows when that will be, considering they do not contact you. Furthermore they told me it would be delivered on a saturday. Come to find out they arent even open. Dont see how it would be possible to run a business when your office is closed and your delivery drivers are enroute.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave your review of our business. Customer satisfaction is our highest priority and we appreciate and take seriously all customer concerns. We do not have your name or contact information, but we would like to speak with you. Please contact us at (256) 734-9334 so that we may better understand and ensure your satisfaction. Thank you.

name: Chris M
text: They are horrible.  They called once and didn't reach anyone so, they simply didn't call back for days and then 30 minutes before they arrived at my home, called from a private cell phone number and didn't leave a message as to who they were and didn't deliver the mattress.  Then went so far as to say they would deliver when it was "worth it" to drive to my address.  I will lodge a formal complaint with Costco.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear that you had an unpleasant experience with Henderson Moving & Transfer. name: bethlambrecht
text:
Worst experience ever with this company who delivered my furniture that I purchased from Wayfair. Not only were they rude to my husband during the first delivery, we NEVER received a courtesy call 30 minutes prior to the first time, and the second time we got the courtesy call it was the minute they stepped onto my porch. They never gave me time to arrive home. It was not a 30 MINUTE courtesy call as the lady at the front desk promised as well as
Wayfair.

When I text the delivery personel halfway home, he said it's a front porch delivery, it's already there. Now, while I realize we only paid for front porch delivery, the last time they dropped off the loveseat, they sat it inside the front door, we did not ask them to unpack, nor did we pay for that. BUT, he was very unempathetic, and did NOT care at all.  The delivery personel's attitude was very, very poor.  It was blocking the doorway LITERALLY and we could not get in the front door.  I WOULD NEVER USE THEM AGAIN FOR ANYTHING.

I contacted Wayfair and they handled it professionally and apologized for Henderson moving and storage for the way they handled the delivery. They made it right.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear that you had an unpleasant experience with Henderson Moving & Transfer. name: Barry Stoner
text: An expensive piano was supposed to be picked up at a residence in Hanceville at 8:00 today Aug. 27, 2016 to be delivered this sat. morn to our Church in Cullman, City. We waited all morning long and as of 3:45 PM, still no piano.After several phone calls trying to track them down we discovered that the the piano wasn't picked up until 10 A.M.. They told the person in Hanceville that they didn't get back from a delivery in Tenn. until 3:00 A.M. this morning and that is why they were late getting there. If they plan on storing the piano in their truck this hot and humid weekend the heat can potentially cause the sounding board to crack and the piano would be ruined. Moving a piano is not a job for amateurs and judging by their failure to deliver as promised in a timely manner it appears that this company is not being run by professionals. I guess being on time and taking care of expensive merchandise is not a priority of this company. I called their office and got an answering machine and no cell phone to find out  the status of said deliver. I punched in their address found on the internet plugged it into the GPS and went looking for them to no avail. Needless to say our experience with this company is very frustrating and disappointing. It is now 4:00 P.M and I am going to Church one more time to see if their happens to be a moving truck off loading a piano.  If not, more to follow.

name: Simona Williams
text:
Negative four stars if that's possible. I have the same exact experience as the other reviews. No call to reschedule, when I was able to get the lady on the phone she was extremely rude, stating she had no idea how to contact the movers and they would give a thirty minute call prior to delivery. They said they would deliver at 10:30am. It's 4:10 and I'm still waiting for the call. To Make Matters worse leaving to go out of town. Can't get it reschedule until I
Come back. Ugh.

text: Great experiences with this location! I have used this service twice now, and have had no problems. Ryan was a great help in figuring out what unit was the best for me, and even showed me the various units so I could get a better understanding of what would fit my items.

name: Sarah Adkins-Jablonsky
text:
This is the first one star review I’ve ever given.

Uhaul cancelled without our notice and did not care, leaving us in the cold

We rented a 15 ft truck weeks before a cross city move from this Vestavia location. The day before, we got a call saying the pick up location was at True Value in Helena AL. When we get there, the True Value reps said it was not available due to a mishap with another customer and to call to find a location where we could pick up our truck. When we called the Vestavia store to find out truck, they said our reservation had been cancelled. When? By whom? They could not tell us (????) but said there was a cancellation email (but we never received an email— our emails only tell us to go to TrueValue). So we are left without a truck and without an apology.

When we try to make a new reservation, the closest option was a 30ft truck a 3 hour round trip away.

U-Haul permanently lost a customer.

name: Krista Bell
text: The employee we saw at pickup was very nice. Per our contract, we rented the uhaul from 5:30pm to 8:30pm, but this kind employee told us we could turn it in before opening the next day (7am). We returned at 6:45am, and Sabrina was very rude and charged us for 2 days. (We only had the uhaul for 12 hours.) When I explained the situation, she just kept stating to “read the contract”. I’m aware of what the contract said as I made the reservation, but when an employee tells me differently, I take their word. Very disappointed.

name: Louis Gobeo
text: Outstanding service. The day I visited, the manager was working through an issue with their alarm. Despite what was surely a stressful situation, she provided prompt and courteous service and bent over backwards to help us out with our rental. I cannot recommend this place enough. Thank you!

text: wonderful staff great, clean and cool storage facilities

text: Friendly service and was everything i needed! Will only rent from this location in the future! Top notch business!

name: Bill Pesnell
text: I have rented from this location numerous times. Without fail, and consistent on each and very rental, the manager Sabrena, and the staff have been polite, extremely helpful, open to suggestions, and overall, a joy with which to work. Not once have I ever had an issue. I would recommend that potential new customers overlook the one-off bad review because everyone has a bad day now and then. Big picture, Sabrena and the crew will bend over backwards to help any way they can. I will not rent from any other vendor or location if at all possible. Five Star service without a doubt.

name: Justin Hardy
text: I needed a dolly on short notice, Sabrena and her crew came through with flying colors. She was extremely courteous and very personable. I'll definitely be coming back to her for any future needs.

Sabrina came out to our truck while we were unloading into our storage to do the paperwork to return the truck. She saw that we had our baby with us and wanted to help us get out of there faster! Would recommend to everyone!

name: Molly Hill
text: General Manager Sabrina  is rude, mean and disrespectful! She loves to hang up on customers, and over charge them. Don’t do business with her ever. Just plain nasty. She uses her authority in the wrong way manner. Not fit to manage anyone!!

name: cece tarver
text: The worker Paul  at this location lied about a free month when he overheard me and my sister talking about taking our things to another storage facility because they have a 1 month free promotion and he says so do we now fast forward a month later and I have late fees and liens in my property because he lied. You can never get anyone on the phone no matter what time of day it is. Also I have called corporate several times spoke with someone named David Reed who was very short and nasty because he kept saying you have to call the store and speak with them when I explained that no one is on the office when I get off at 6. Even though I was told they are there until 7. So I was told on Thursday that he would call me back by 1:00 that day to discuss this (remind you this is the guy who lied to me.) Still haven't spoke with the manager at this facility and I thinks it's because they know they messed up. So for 3 weeks I have been given the run around and still no district manager or nothing. I will say this how ever it turn out from thus point I WILL NOT NOR WILL I RECOMMEND THIS UHAUL COMPANY TO ANYONE! Now the lie is it's only if you are moving one way (BUT WHO MOVES OUT OF STATE AND PUT THERE THINGS IN A STORAGE IT MAKES NO DENSE AT ALL!!!!!) Save your time and money and go to another place. The manager at the location up the street is worse his name is Antonio. Don't know why any of these people got into customer service cause clearly they are not cut out for this job. They say you pay for what you get so buyer beware this is what I got lesson learned that's for sure!!!!!!!

name: Jenna Jackson
text:
Armstrong Relocation helped my company move out of three buildings into one new office building over the course of about a month. We coordinated all the details before each move, received an overall quote, and then the team far exceeded expectations by completing each move much faster than anticipated, which drastically lowered our final invoice! Very affordable, very organized, and easy to work with.

They also assembled pallet racks for our new warehouse facility, once again exceeding expectations with their quick work.

resp.text: Jenna, thank you so much for sharing your positive experience! Our teams are always encouraged to do their best to take care of each customer and we love hearing that they are doing just that. We hope you and your company enjoy the new building!

name: Dorota Hughes
text: Last week Armstrong Relocation moved me from Chattanooga, TN to Madison, AL and I can honestly say that it was the easiest move I have ever done and I have moved a lot in the past. Both teams, from Chattanooga and Huntsville were everything I ever wanted from movers. They were so efficient that by the time I realized my whole condo was packed and the guys were closing the truck to drive it to Alabama. They were done 5 minutes before the time time they said they would which was even more impressive and showed their degree experience. None of my items were damaged and by the time everything was unpacked I felt home again. Thank you Armstrong Relocation, you really know how to provide a stress-free and professional moving service.

resp.text: Dorota, we are so glad to hear you had stress-free experience! We wish you the best as you settle into your new home and hope to have the opportunity to serve you again soon!

name: Chasidy Crum
text: Armstrong Relocation - Huntsville is about as top-notch as they come! I have worked closely with Brad Murphy and he is always professional and very responsive. I completely trust them with any work that they do!

resp.text: Chasidy, thank you so much for the positive review! Brad is one of the best and we are happy to have him on our team. Thank you for putting your trust in Armstrong.

name: Teresa Lewis
text: They did a fabulous job on a pretty complex move. Our move involved sensitive manufacturing equipment, computer equipment, and general office furniture and IT equipment. They were on time, professional, and came in under budget!!

resp.text: Teresa, thank you so much for sharing your positive experience with us! We are happy to hear everything went well and hope to serve you again in the future.

name: Travis Duehring
text: Armstrong was very flexible with our schedule.  Each time we had to move out the date, they accommodated.  The movers were on time, professional, and courteous.

resp.text: Travis, glad to hear you had a great experience. We look forward to serving you again in the future!

name: Daniel Cooper
text: Larry Binder and his crew did an excellent job. They were on time, very polite, quick and efficient, and communicated with me and my wife every step of the way. It’s amazing to me how fast they are.

resp.text: We’re happy to hear you had a great move. Thanks for sharing your feedback. We’ll be sure to share your comments with Larry and the rest of the team.

name: Kyle Mavin
text: Great company - very professional both onsite guys and logistical communication was great. There was small damage caused to my equipment and they responded immediately and worked with me on making the issue right. Jim SanSoucie was great - Use these guys if you need moving assistance in Huntsville!

resp.text: Hi, Kyle! Thank you for your kind review. We are happy we were able to make things right with your move. Please do not hesitate to call us should you ever need moving services again in the future.

name: Kristin Sartelle
text: Outstanding!  Exceeded every expectation. They meticulously packed and carefully loaded our house for a cross state move. I was overjoyed when the truck arrived—on time—at our new house because I knew they would do everything possible to help me get things in the correct places...and they did!  I highly recommend them!

resp.text: Hi, Kristin! It is great to hear that we exceeded your expectations. Best of luck at your new residence!

name: Ric Schank
text:
Moved my elderly mom from Huntsville to Colorado. Looked at all reviews for long distance movers and found that Armstrong had the best consistent reviews. Had a virtual assessment and they came up with a Binding contract for the weight of my mother belongings. They packed about 3 dish packs, 8 picture boxes,two TV's and a few other boxes.I packed about 20 boxes. One bed, one loveseat, headboard,desk, dinning room table, couch and two occasional chairs. The apartment was a 2 BR
1400sf apartment. No washer dryer or refrigerator. The estimate was 7000 lbs which seemed high but I TRUSTED their evaluation based on the reviews. On arrival the driver stated that the weight was more like 4000 lbs. In my eyes that is a significant discrepancy. When asked for the final payment of 6900 dollars I mentioned this to the coordinator. The owner of the company called and said the estimate was Binding. I agreed that I had indeed agreed to a Binding estimate but it seemed wildly over inflated. His response was that I had signed the contract and I could have gotten other estimates. Really not the point but he seemed to be incapable of understanding my point. Therefore my 85 year old mom payed the bill. Otherwise the move was average. The Packers spent most of the time on their phones. The driver was prompt and coutrtious and took great care to wrap my belongings. Took a few days to wipe down all furniture and get the smell of smoke off furniture....not uncommon. Drivers shouldn't smoke in cabin but I don't know how that can be controlled. Just glad the move is over even though I feel badly for my mom that she overpaid for the move.

resp.text:
Hi, Ric!
We are sorry for your disappointment regarding the quote provided to your mother. I am more than happy to discuss the quote further as outlined in prior  phone conversation and on the provided documentation. Armstrong takes customer satisfaction seriously and strives to continually provide an exceptional experience. As it relates to on-the-job expectations, we will certainly share your feedback with our crew members. Feel free to contact me directly at 256.258.2204 to further discuss these concerns.

name: Jared Casdorph
text: Great people to work with

resp.text: Jared, thank you for sharing your experience with us! We are always so pleased to hear of another positive encounter with our team. Thank you for choosing Armstrong!

name: Joe Forrest
text:
Armstrong Relocation made several promises and they were true to their word!  They arrived on time, packed with great care, and responded positively to a few requests.  Their entire team was very professional and mindful of our needs!
I have used them on several occasions and will continue as long as they respond as they did this time!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much. Repeat customers are the highest form of compliment to us, and we are so pleased to hear that you had such positive experiences with us!

name: Mike Banks
text: A big thanks to Brad and the team at Armstrong for helping us with a last minute move and I do mean last minute!  They came through in a jam and helped us in their usual professional manner.  They have been helping us with our moving needs for many years and always meet our needs and expectations.  That is important as a commercial building manager. I need to have a moving specialist I can count on. Thanks to Brad and his team I have that.  Great work guys!  Mike, Samples Properties

resp.text: Thank you, Mike.  It's been an honor serving you and your company all these years.

name: Elizabeth Million
text: I moved from St. Louis Mo to Huntsville in January and Armstrong Relocation made moving so much less stressful! From start to finish it was a positive experience. The move coordinator made sure that I was ready and had all the information I needed before the driver arrived. I had never done a virtual survey and after doing one it was very accurate and easy. The driver was very helpful and polite. He answered all my questions and concerns. I would definitely recommend Arnstrong to my family and friends !

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review of our services and team members.  We are thankful to have been chosen as your preferred mover assisting you to the Huntsville area.

name: Kim Galkowski
text: Brad and his crew moved our center into a new facility. We had 8 + regular employees plus storage and items for temporary employees. Brad and his crew were very professional. They arrived at appointed times and were very efficient and careful with all of the equipment and furniture. I will continue to rely on Brad and his team any time I have a need for a move (as a matter of fact, I am getting ready to use him again to move some equipment).

resp.text: Thanks you for the kind words regarding our services.  We appreciate you and your organization greatly.

name: Michael Burns
text: I have been using Armstrong for more than 18 years for my companies moves related to employee and manufacturing.  The communication with the team is always very professional and thorough.  Timing is always perfect and the teams that that arrive are dedicated and careful.   They have even handled the coordination with my moves in across the U.S. so that end to end I have been happy.  Problems cannot be avoided with as many moves as I have been involved with. But when there has been any problem it has always been corrected to my satisfaction.   That being said, as many moves as I have had in all those years I can only remember 2 problems.  That is an outstanding record.  I have recommended Armstrong to friends outside of work numerous times and they have been treated 100% as well as I am had been treated.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review.  We appreciate your dedication to our team servicing your move activities.  It is always and honor to work with you.

name: Kathy Cagle
text: I have used Armstrong Relocation for more than 10 years to move new hires and current co-workers relocating to other locations and have been 100% satisfied every time.  They are professional, timely and courteous to our relocating employees during a usually stressful time.  I have received numerous compliments and “thank you” notes from employees and spouses regarding the move experience with Armstrong Relocation.  We have made a multiple office moves and our IT staff requests them each time based on their performance and special care with IT equipment.  Definitely recommend them for all moves!

resp.text: It has always been an honor to work with you and the companies you've served.  Thanks for taking us with you along the way and continued support of our operation.

name: Amanda Richards
text:
My husband's employer contracted with this company to move our belongings from Arkansas to the Huntsville, Alabama area. They were terrible!

The morning of the move, they showed up several hours late. One of the men was exceptionally rude, refusing to speak to us even when addressed directly. He packed our garage, and, when they were preparing to leave, I opened the door to find that he'd left many items in there. Even his co-worker was displeased with his actions.

Our belongings were in storage for about two weeks while we closed on our new home. The men who unloaded them were very good- friendly, thorough, and careful.

Unfortunately, several items had been poorly packed and were broken upon arrival- a chair, bookshelves, fragile items. They had thrown our Christmas tree topper into a box, and then threw heavy tools on top of it. They wrote our tracking number directly *on* some of our furniture with black permanent marker!

Worst of all, they LOST a small trunk that contained heirlooms and family memorabilia. We didn't have room for it in our vehicle, and I was assured it would reach our new location safely. Well, it didn't.

When we called to report the missing and broken items, we received no compassion, no apology. No effort was made to find the missing trunk. The representative assigned to us was curt, and behaved as if we were wasting his time. He just emailed us a claim form, and told us to value the missing items for reimbursement.

How am I supposed to place a value on my children's locks of hair, the bible my great-grandfather gave me before he died, my high school yearbooks and photos, the stuffed Fox my oldest daughter slept with every night? They're literally irreplaceable!

We ended up with a check to replace the broken furniture. I would never, ever recommend this company to anyone. It was an absolutely infuriating and heart-breaking experience.

resp.text:
Amanda,
We take these matters very seriously, and unfortunately, we cannot verify anything about your identity from your name in our records. If you were an Armstrong - Huntsville customer, we would like to investigate this issue further. Please contact our agency president, Brad Murphy, at 256.772.6664.

name: Daniel Brigman
text:
My family and I just completed our 10th move due to a professional transition out of state.  Not all of our moves have been pleasant and resulted in high stress, damaged goods and higher moving costs in the end.  However, my family and I have recently had a totally different experience with Armstrong Relocation & Companies.
In preparation for the move, three moving companies were contacted for quotes.  Brad Murphy came to our house on two separate occasions, the first to ascertain our moving needs and the second to adjust the initial quote to ensure the accuracy of our moving estimate.  The initial quote was actually reduced to reflect the adjustment in estimated weight.  The quote provided was a “not to exceed” amount, giving me and my family reassurance of no surprises at the end of our move.
From the initial planning stages throughout the entire process, we received world-class service and support from all employees at Armstrong Moving, particularly Brad Murphy with coordination of our move, Justin who oversaw the pick-up and delivery, and Michelle, the outstanding receptionist who left her post at the front desk on three occasions to help us load packing materials at the loading dock.  All employees consistently went beyond all expectations to support us prior to and during our move.  All of our household items, including very fragile materials and heavy shop equipment were moved with extraordinary care and arrived to our new home without one scratch or any damage.   All deadlines and schedules were accurately met with ongoing communications from representatives throughout our moving process.  I truly hope Brad Murphy and the Armstrong Relocation & Companies are available if another move is needed in the future.  Without hesitation, I will go the Armstrong way once again.   Thank you for a JOB WELL DONE!

D. Brigman,
Rentz, GA

text: If I could sum up their service in one sentence, I would say, "These people are very serious about moving." They did an excellent job of packing loose items and had a separate team come out and make wooden crates for my glass aquariums. Very little damage was noted on any of the furnishings (I think a little is bound to happen); the worst of it was a ceramic pepper shaker which had broken, but then again I had packed it. I am very pleased with the movers, packers, and service representatives at Armstrong Relocation. My company chose these movers for me (I moved from northwest Arkansas to northern Alabama), but I couldn't imagine using a different company. I would highly recommend them if you value your possessions.

name: Jelisa Williams
text: Let me start by saying Jarvis was an outstanding customer service representative! However, my experience with public storage has been far from pleasant. 2 months after moving into my unit I went by to check on my furniture (2 bedroom sets and a living room set) and was horrified when I was greeted by a dead rat at the front of my storage unit. The explanation given by the customer service representative Nyrie was, "We try to tell people not to leave food in their unit. It probably came from another unit." Today I went in to close out my account and was told that although I was closing my account out today December 5, 2017 I would be charged until the end of the month. Originally I was told that the amount would be prorated however was later told that they no longer prorate because their competitors do not prorate. I followed up with the district manager Jennifer Sanders and was told that unless I kept my personal lock on the unit they would rent the unit out to someone else although I was charged for the remainder of december, which I must say I find inappropriate. She then proceeded to hang the phone up. Next time I will keep my business with grand slam storage. CHEAPER ISN'T ALWAYS BETTER!  YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR!

text: I was trying to figure out the logistics with my truck/tow rental, and the Uhaul call center was not very helpful and often had a 20-39 minute wait. I went in and talked to Anthonio, the General Manager, and he got everything figured out! He was very professional and helpful.

name: Shan Key
text: Worst customer service I have ever seen anywhere.  Had a scheduled appointment with them to install a hitch at 9:00. This was the first available spot two weeks ago. Did arrive 30 min late. Girl at counter was nice and said it would be ready in approximately 1.5 hours. Left it for 2.5 hours and came back. Car has not been touched. I drove an hour to get there and an hour home. Wrecked half a day. Asked for a full refund. Asked for the manger and he yelled at me, saying “we call you when ready”. I asked was it complete and he yelled “does it have a hitch on it?”  He didn’t know or care and walked outside to see. I asked for the contact info of his manager. I called him and all he said was we let you down and I will talk to manager. They should have put the car on the rack, and knocked it out and offered some sort of discount. I leave on vacation tomorrow so no hitch, no trailering. I wouldn’t spend a dime here ever again, and it’s no wonder there rating is so low here and on y e l p.

name: Jessica Wallace
text: I’ve rented from life storage for almost a year. The price is great and I feel secure when I’m there. Unlike other storage places the gates are closed throughout the day so you don’t feel like just anyone can come in. It’s clean and I’ve not seen any leaks or any damage in the units. I recently moved to another unit and the staff is wonderful. Sheila really helped me out and went above and beyond for me. I appreciate the service I get.

text: Great discussion with Sheila at the front desk.  Visual security cameras, gate access and working gates both in and out. Large dumpsters to use so loving it so far.  Payments online and recurring with online access to update and change.  Ready to move in with clean and painted floors-well taken care of property.

text: They destroyed a brand new couch. Left tons of stuff at apartment. They said and I QUOTE " but you signed the completed form". Well I can't be in both locations to check your work. BEWARE HORRIBLE COMPANY.

name: C Elliott
text:
I have used Two Men and a Truck numerous times in the Birmingham, AL area.  Now that I live in Foley AL, I called Two Men in a Truck's Foley location to set up a local move.  I went in to the office and spoke with the manager  Katelyn who told me I would only need one truck and two men, based on the fact that I have a one bedroom apartment.  She also told me that a week day is a much cheaper rate.  So I agreed and scheduled a day off work and set up my move for a Wednesday.  I paid the deposit of $125.00 which I was told would come off of my balance due after the move.  Within 10 minutes of leaving the office, I received a phone call from Crystal out of Mobile, AL.  She told me that there would be no way that two men could move me with one load in under 8 hours and to save time and money I need to increase to three men.  After my hesitation but her persistence and pressure, I agreed (bumping my hourly rate up to $165.00 from $125.00 I originally agreed to).  So Wednesday my move day came.  I received a phone call from the driver who said "we are leaving the lot and we are 2 minutes away"  which is absolutely true the lot is approximately 3 miles from my storage unit.  They arrived, loaded me up (the truck was barely half full) and went to my new residence which is a 5 mile drive and unloaded.  They were finished in less than 5 hours.  I completed the transaction on the tablet the driver had and paid my balance due.  Within 5 minutes of paying and the movers leaving I once AGAIN received a phone call from Crystal out of Mobile, AL who tells me that the GPS in the truck miscalculated the time and distance and I owe an additional $185.00.  My total bill for a 5 hour local move ended up costing me over $1,100.  RIDICULOUS  !
I feel very ripped off by this company and by Crystal who twice contacted me to increase the amount of money I owe. I ended up paying for more than 5 hours plus the deposit (which got bumped up to $165) suddenly became travel costs and costs for the materials to wrap my furniture.  My receipt stated that the drivers came from Mobile, AL an hour's drive away.  Another rip off from this company.
Once I was in my apartment I realized that two pieces of my furniture were damaged.  Not one piece of my furniture was ever wrapped - even though I was charged for quilts and pads.  The young men that moved me were not professional in their moving abilities and how to take careful care of furniture and especially boxes marked fragile.
So after many many many phone calls I did have a headboard replaced, but my phone calls regarding my dining room table damages have been avoided.
This company is a poor reflection on Two Men and a Truck corporation.  This franchise is a money trap and so unprofessional.  It's a shame that the people in my area who have been displaced by a hurricane would be taken advantage of by a local moving company.  I will never use this location or franchise again and will make sure that I tell everyone I know in southern Baldwin County who need a mover to AVOID Two Men and a Truck Mobile, AL / Foley, AL

resp.text: We are sorry that you had a bad experience. With a satisfaction rate of 96%, this is not up to our standards. Please contact a member of our operations team at: 251-316-5977.

text:
Overcharged is only the beginning ; this is a time based service at $31.25 for every fifteen minutes and they do take their time . As an example ; I caught one of them coming out of the truck with one table lamp in his hand to take upstairs " ONE " the other hand was free and there was plenty of things he could have carried in the other hand .  I told both of the movers I was on a fixed income and price mattered  to me , and I
I was told not to worry they could get it done fast and in the time I needed them to ; that never happened .   I would never , ever, ever, recommend this group , and of course never use their services again .

name: Jeff P.
text: I would not use this business again. Looking back at the paperwork ,  now that I am at my desk, I was clearly overcharged as the driver did not arrive at the time represented on the paperwork.  Furthermore, BEFORE the delivery driver and helper started to move my items, I was asked, and felt a bit pressured, to initial and sign paperwork that acknowledged "A final walk through" and verification that my items had been removed from the truck.  Needless to say, I did not complete this portion of the paperwork until the move was complete.  During the delivery process, one of the movers lost control of his hand-truck and several of my desktops fell and ended up in the parking lot.  Lastly, while completing the initial paperwork on-site, the driver seemed to indicate that I should have received certain paperwork/quote ahead of time. This was not the case.

name: Kay Martin
text: This company delivered my items from Orange Beach, AL TO Monroe, GA on February 14-15, 2020. Upon leaving my son’s property, they ran into a newly installed security gate, about three weeks old, scraping it, jamming into the ground, damaging a post and the monitor, bending the metal on the gate, then left without a word. My son walked down to close the gate and discovered the damage. This company has said that they are not obligated to file insurance claims and felt they were not at fault AFTER the driver told them it happened!! After much talking, pleading this company sent my son a check for $500 for a $3200 gate. They finally agreed to hire a contracror to install, billing to be taken care of by Two Men and a Truck. The contractor worked for two days, demanded money from my son, left, never came back. NOW , the contractor says that the company will not pay him so he is threatening my son with a lien for $3200.  The contractor’s work was not correct and workers are now correcting his work. My son did not hire this man. SO my question is, why does the contract that I signed state that damages caused by workers will be corrected at no cost to me as mistakes do happen??  Contractually, Two Men and a Truck have not honored  the contract that I signed in good faith. These people have accused my son of lying about the damage, yet proof was provided to them that this was a new gate. White paint scrapes were on the metal. This treatment to a customer is unacceptable, unethical. .

text: I used the two men and a truck in Gulf Shores Alabama.they moved me from the third floor of an apartment to the first floor of the same building apartment. Let me just say this. Trust me. Said almost $500 and they moved 12 pieces of furniture, they said my couches in Black soil, charged $100 for truck charge didn't even use it(their office is under 8 mins from our apartments), out of 3-4hrs 1.5 hrs was actual moving. I put in a complaint so the manager whom I thought was refunding me some money and was sending me a $50 gift card to longhorns. So me getting any money back apparently I was mistaken and as far as the longhorns goes it was probably one of the best steaks I ever had but even at the end of the meal I still had a god-awful taste in my mouth from two men and a truck. This was back around February March what just made me finally write something is I just saw where there office was for the first time and when I saw how close it was to our apartment I couldn't keep quiet about it anymore.

text:
Customer service was great.  Ms. Christy was lovely. She gets 5 stars. However, the facility is nice at first sight.  But I do wish that there were flat beds available for large loads (less loading/unloading trips) versus the tiny ones (several tiny loading/unloading trips).  Compared to my last storage facility it's iffy.  My last one had the works as far as hauling tools/equipment for multiple people one time at both entrances.  But it was an across town move so I need the quick access and convenience.  Plus I hear they increase rent ever so often.
My last one didn't....you're the same rate until your contract changes when you're done. This will be temporary storing.  Hoping the surveillance is kosher.  3.75 stars for now. #tryingtimes I couldn't be picky and so yeah.  #betterdaysahead

name: A'Marrie
text: I needed a storage space last minute and this one was perfect. It's located only a few minutes from my current residence and it's in close proximity to UAB. There weren't a bunch of bullcrap fees or ridiculous rates, which I ran into with other Storage companies. I can't remember their names off-hand, but each person that I spoke with was kind and very helpful with helping me get my unit. It's super affordable and just the right size for all of my things. By the way, I'm a struggling college student so when I say affordable, I mean it. All units are indoors so you don't have to worry about your belongings molding or rusting from the weather and they have dollies right near the elevator and front entrance. I'm really glad I found them when I did, it definitely alleviated some of my worries with transitioning to a new residence.

text: I spoke with Brad last week and he ordered wiring for my car hitch.  I spoke with him yesterday afternoon and he set an appointment for today at 4pm to install. He then starts texting and I ask him to contact Brad who I set the appointment with. He said that he was texting him that Brad was at a  meeting. By this time I was angry   .  I called CTU down the road and they will have my stuff in tomorrow and install tomorrow afternoon.. I told the guy at the uhaul counter I would not need their service and  I was taking my business elsewhere.  He did not even seem to care.  I suggest a lesson in customer service

text: My name is D. Davis, The circumstances behind me having to get storage space has and is an horrid ordeal. Her demeanor was professional and courteous  via phone contact and office visit. I was able to get the storage space I needed without any difficulties because she explained online is an option and not a necessity. I obtained my my storage space.  Also I will most definitely refer anyone that needs a storage space to Public Storage on Lorna Road where Ms Juanita is the office manager. Ms. Juanita is an asset to your company. name: Christy Jameson
text: I recently vacated my space on August 2, 2020.  The previous day on the 1st I spoke to the manager on-site.  She was very nice and very customer service friendly.  I spoke about vacating my space so I wouldn’t be charged for another month.  It didn’t seem like a problem, she mentioned coming to get her when I was  finished, and I even made mention that I may not be done that day.  I was told no problem.  I came to the office on the 2nd at 10:00 am, let her know I was out, it swept clean and empty.  I then at that time asked if the auto-debit would still go through on my account as has been done religiously for 2 years, she said yes but that the pro-rates refund amount would be returned in approximately 5-7 days.  Today is a week and a half later, I tried to contact the site, spoke with an extremely rude customer service rep (NOT the on-site staff for clarification), and after with the District Manager Jordan. I was informed that I would not be receiving any money back as the rent is month to month and nothing would be done-however when I moved in I was pro-rated for days then? That it was policy....I fully understand that, I deal with policy every day-I am also have a responsibility to act fairly and not hide beyond policy and take care of my customers.  When I asked specifically (and while in the office ON THE 1st) when I would receive the difference back-that would have been the time to be upfront, transparent and honest about the truth about the intent to not refund the remaining days on my unit.  If I would have not been told a refund was coming I would have stayed the month-and not called regarding my pro-rated refund.  If that wasn’t what I was told why would I be calling? Bottom line here, I moved up the street to Extra Space Storage, rented the same size unit for $18/month.  I was paying Public Storage $89 after 3 increases over 6 mos.  for the same size unit.  At this day in age a simple apology for the miscommunication and an effort to reimburse me something would have been appreciated and seen as compromise, the lack of an attempt to make it right is unacceptable to me.  It’s not the $89 at this point it’s the principal of managing my expectations as a consumer.  Please go up the street to Extra Space Storage, who were very decent about not wanting to steal their customer by the way, business is business.  The pro-rated refund would have been easier at this point instead of a negative google review and friends that also rent there and now will know to relocate.  Hope it was worth it, I do plan to make further calls.  At this point I do want my money over the principal of standing up for myself and what is right.  By the way, I work for a large property management company in town and in 2 other states that I travel, we were using Public Storage on our marketing material for new move-ins to our apartments and giving them this location in just Birmingham.  That will be changing.  Hiding beyond policy is one thing, refusing to see your company miscommunicated and screwed up is another.

I'm very pleased with the unit and the service I received!

text: The facilities were very clean and proper. Beth and Pamela really went above and beyond to assist me when other stores simply told me "how it is." Great rates and the friendliest public storage employees I've met thus far.

text: These guys are the absolute best! They were the only company that was available to move me before I leave for vacation on 2 days and at a great rate compared to their competitors. They were on time, very friendly, and listened to all my needs with no issue. There’s a reason they get all these rave reviews, they are the real deal and I’d recommend them to anyone!

name: Spencer Ellis
text: Nick and Shep were awesome! Came right on time, were quick, and had positive attitudes. They handled everything with care and were safe loading/unloading my furniture.

name: Mary Katherine White
text: I had a GREAT experience with MoveDaddy! David and Joshua were my movers and they were extremely helpful and professional. Everything was moved without a scratch, and in good time. I will definitely be using again!

name: M Mahan
text: 3rd time to use them for moving assistance and #4 is planned for next week. They were timely (told me 2-4 pm and they called at 2:08pm), professional and very polite/friendly. Charlie and Andrew did an exceptional job and I hope to have them on my crew next week. Big thank you!

name: Rob Pannell
text:
Nick, Phillip, Mark and Andrew were awesome! Very professional, knowledgeable, and efficient!

No task too large, but still careful with delicate items. We did not have ANY breaks or scratches and it was a huge move.

I would give 6 stars if I could.

name: Anna
text: David and Izaak did a fantastic job - very thoughtful and thorough. They took on challenges with ease and managed to squeeze everything in through old door frames. They did a great job of communicating about time. They even assembled two beds. Everything was well taken care of and they were super careful with all of my things. Highly recommend!

name: adam arendsen
text: I had Andrew and Spencer come out to help me move this weekend. Great guys. They showed up a little early, had a good game plan, very friendly and professional. Asked questions when needed and overall just a great experience. I'd get them again for when I have to move after this place.

name: Pam Corley
text:
We used Move Daddy recently for two moves.  Each time they were on time, worked very efficiently, did not waste time, were very friendly and respectful.  Our team was extremely professional.  I will use them again if needed and highly recommend them.

They were also able to accommodate us when our move date was pushed up which was a very big deal to us.

The men that worked at the storage facility even mentioned how hard and efficient they were working!

USE THEM FOR YOUR MOVE!  Their rates are very fair as well.

Pam Corley

name: Miss Ro
text: Hands down, the best movers ever! Exceptional would be an understatement. Chris and Nick were polite and professional. The care they took with my items was impressive especially considering the stairs I have in my home. Furniture delivery men have not handled the stairs as well. I highly recommended these guys and this company. Very happy with the service. The only thing I don’t like is that they charge you for their ride back to the shop. I feel like they should stop charging once the job is over.

name: Adrienne D.C. Brown
text:
Seth and Phillip were a great team!
Jared ensured they were cognitive of my budget and made sure it was done in that time frame. I hope to not move again soon but if I do, I’ll definitely use them again!

name: Evan Bailey
text: Great company fast moving and good at what they do!! Andrew and spencer handled my belongings with great care. They both are very professional! Highly recommended!! A++

name: Kathy Guest
text: David and Issac were AMAZING! They literally ran back up 2 flights of stairs to get the next load. Loaded it in record time! So nice and helpful! This is our second move with them and I highly recommend them. Will use them again for sure!

name: Joy DeShazo
text: I scheduled with Movedaddy for a long distance move after two other moving companies fell through. It was incredibly easy to schedule with them over the phone in comparison with the other businesses. Mark and Harrison did an excellent job even though the parking situation was difficult, it was pouring rain, and they had to climb a flight of stairs. They were very quick and professional and handled my things with care. The cost was also very reasonable. Overall, my experience exceeded expectations and I would highly recommend scheduling with Movedaddy if you want a smooth and easy move!

name: James Carter
text: Zack and Luke did a fantastic job of moving my family's furniture from Bessemer to Trussville. They were able to come out earlier than scheduled, and they worked tirelessly to get the job done quickly and professionally. I'd highly recommend these two amicable fellows to anyone considering hiring movers.

name: Sarah Russell
text:
I've used move daddy twice now and both times I had a 5 star experience.  Seth and Joshua had to problem solve and maneuver heavy furniture into an old apartment building with narrow hallways and doors. Unfortunately  they were unable to get my large couch in the door after trying everything possible, but I couldn't even be mad after the group effort and brainstorming. Joshua and Seth remained positive and professional throughout my entire challenging move.
A few days later when I had to move in my new couch, I called Jered for advice. He offered to send two movers to pick up the couch from the warehouse and bring it in for me! It wasn't easy but Izaak and McManus were miraculously able to fit a sectional in my new place. They set it up for me as well.
Move daddy's customer service is outstanding. A stressful move was made bearable because of them. This is easily the best moving company in Birmingham at a reasonable price.

name: Robert Hulsey
text: Jenkins, Zack, and David helped us with our local move and were fantastic. They were prompt, polite, quick, careful, and moved all our our furniture perfectly. I can’t recommend them enough, they were great. Well worth the money, which was fairly priced to begin with. Would definitely use them again.

name: Brian Phillips
text: I was VERY impressed! I shopped around and choose the company with the best price thinking that we might not get the best service but I was wrong. Mark and Izaak were amazing. They were there early, friendly, professional and fast! They were literally running back to the truck to grab boxes and did it all with a smile. I would absolutely use these guys again!

name: Elizabeth Martin
text: My office recently moved locations, and Izaak and Mark did such a brilliant job relocating our things. It took 2 large trips, and they were friendly, enjoyable to work with, and so incredibly efficient and safe. I highly recommend them for any moving needs!

name: Will Shafferman
text: Great experience. Would for sure use again. Mark, Will and David were sharp, professional, and punctual. They handled our things with care and diligence. No slacking - they would run back to the truck in between items to reduce time spent on the move. 5 out of 5 for me.

name: Jo Bailey
text:
Izaak and Mark did a great job running up the stairs after every load and moving fast, throughout the whole morning. They were very nice, polite and both had great attitudes. Thank them again for us.
Campus Outreach serve, Jo Bailey.

name: Tracey Dobbs
text: Movers were extremely slow and inefficient. I was pressured to hire a second crew during the move for twice the cost because they were unable to move the contents of a 3 BR house in 11 hours. Movers frequently carried only one small box at a time. Never utilized the hand trucks for multiple boxes. They broke my Christmas china and lied about it. I called to address the issues with management and was told there was no way I could have had a bad experience because they only have excellent reviews.

name: Anca Hanson
text: Our move was a success and progressed well and ahead of schedule thanks to the expertise and efficiency of the team from MoveDaddy. Mark and Izaak ran a smooth operation and brought a lot of ability and professionalism to every step of the process. Great job and awesome working with you 🙌

name: Laura Power
text: My company recently relocated to a different office building across town. Move Daddy sent us two guys, Mark and Izaac, who provided outstanding service! They were fast and didn't damage a single one of our office items. They moved everything from bookcases and desks to picture frames and vases. I recommend these two guys and this company 10/10

name: John Hunt
text: We were moving our business from one office to another. Lots of stuff! Mark and Izaac did a fantastic job of making this headache work smoothly. They were upbeat and worked hard. Impressed!

name: Kelly Plyler
text: I just moved from an apartment into a house, and probably called every moving company in Birmingham for a quote - Move Daddy was the least expensive and the quickest to get back to me, so I chose them based only on that. I was BEYOND impressed with the service they provided, and I was very skeptical since they were so inexpensive! Chris and Izaak arrived exactly on time and were very polite. When they got started, they were literally running back the apartment to get the next load. When they got to the house, I was a little nervous because we live on a narrow street and it is tricky to get into our driveway. The previous movers (different company) left tire tracks all over the lawn. Move Daddy maneuvered the truck in perfectly without touching a single blade of grass. They worked very quickly and efficiently moving everything in and making sure everything was where I wanted it. This was my first move with Move Daddy but next time I will definitely use them again!

name: Shelby Shepherd
text: Mark and Izaac helped our office move buildings IN THE POURING RAIN! They were kind, professional, but the most impressive thing is that they get paid by the hour and they RAN the whole time! They were so fast and helped us move in half the time we thought it would take!

name: Chablis Shultz
text: We moved from our apartment to our home on Monday with Jacob, Ryan, and Seth. Then on Tuesday we moved out of our storage unit with Jacob and Angel. Both teams were professional, on time, took great care handling our furniture at ALL times. They even took furniture for us that we no longer needed. This group of employees were excellent to work with, we could not have asked for better services. We have used other moving companies in the past and will never use a different company again. We loved Move Daddy. 5 stars without hesitation: prompt, polite, cautious, explained things well, great personalities, extremely kind and helpful. Thanks for everything!

name: brian camp
text: I have used Move Daddy for multiple moves over the last 5 years.   Every time is excellent.   I used them again today as well.   Very fast and efficient.   Actually running items to the truck.  Very courteous and asking to help move anything even items we wanted to put in our personal cars.   I am never disappointed.    I’m a realtor and builder so I use them personally and with my business customers.   Today’s Crew was Logan, Christian, Phillip, and David.  All excellent.

name: Kalyx Mcdonald
text: I had a local move within the same complex and Jacob & Phillip were promptly on time and quick! They took are off all my items as they were loading up and unpacking it into the new unit. I will definitely use move daddy again and recommend you all to my friends. Thanks Jacob and Phillip!

name: Mary Ann Duncan
text: Excellent service!  Christian and Phillip were great.  Very friendly and took care being sure furniture was packed well.  Had several pieces with glass shelves and glass doors and they took extra care in being sure they were safe.  Every time I talked with someone in this company they were both courteous and helpful.   I would most definitely use them again.

name: Ragan Butler
text: Great professional movers.  Izaak and Mark did a great job and were fast and careful. Very respectful.

name: Shawn Maye
text: My daughter scheduled this company to move her belongings from her apartment to our home, both residences are approximately 6 miles apart. My daughter had been quoted $108 per hour with a minimum of 2 hours. The guys were very personable and polite.  Upon arrival, I asked that they move a 1 couch, 2 chairs, and 1 recliner to a space in the basement.  Because I knew that this was in addition to the task of the move that they were hired for, I full well expected to pay whatever the charge for this additional work. They’d arrived at my daughter’s apartment at 8am and presented me with the contract at 10:08am...2 hours and 8 minutes.  Seeing that the charge was $378, I inquired if the extra had been to move the other items.  To my surprise the young man told me that there was no additional charge, as we were being charged by the hour.  I then asked if that were the case, why were we charged almost double the contracted 2 hours.  He nicely explained that they charge from the time that they leave their office until they arrive back at the office and then there is a charge for cleaning the vehicle.  It felt like I was being fleeced but I did not object, considering that they’d moved the other items.  I paid and provided a $50 tip for each of them and before going on their way, the young man with the paperwork asked that I please provide them a review on GOOGLE...Well here it is...After going down to the basement, I was beyond appalled and unsettled by the haphazard an uncaring manner that they left the items that they moved for me.  Both chars thrown above the couch, the cushions were scattered about the floor and the recliner had been taken apart.  For the life of me, I cannot understand why these items were placed in this manner,  It took more work to disassemble and place them in such disarray, that it would have to place them in a neat order.  Further, when my husband arrived home, he located the handle for the recliner in the street.  In all honesty, I fault myself for not going down into the basement while they were there.  I just never could have imagined that this is how they left things, especially after being asked to write a review. Just so we’re clear...I would never use or recommend this moving company.  I was fleeced and my personal belongings were disrespected, and I tipped for the favor!  Too bad I can’t give 0 or under a star!

name: Shelley Roman
text: This was my first time using a moving company and it  was so worth it! The guys were all profesional and polite. I have 0 complaints. The price was reasonable for the move. I definitely recommended Move Daddy and will be using them in the future.

name: van phan
text: Nick and Jenkins moved our older 300+ lb spindle piano into our upstairs loft from the downstairs garage. They were extremely careful not to damage the piano or our newly built house. They complied to wearing booties, mask and gloves due to the Covid situation and were extremely professional. After the piano move they  then moved an armoire to my sister’s house and were equally professional there. They were on time. I would highly recommend using this moving service and ask for Nick and Jenkins!

name: Sadie Goodman
text: I needed a baby grand piano moved in-house while some floors were redone. Along with this, moving of some other heavy items out of a room to accommodate the piano being moved. I then had Move Daddy come back 2 weeks later after a floor repair. They moved a lot of furniture throughout my house up and down stairs and outside on ramps to give my living spaces a fresh look. They moved my piano a few inches several times after they were done assembling it to get it in the exact right position I wanted. I’m very grateful to Tucker and Jenkins. They constantly asked me with a positive attitude what else they could do to help me. I will keep hiring Move Daddy in the future.

name: Donna Porter
text: I just want to commend Move Daddy for a fantastic move. I recently downsized into a smaller space which meant two-stops including transferring items into a storage unit and a home. The movers did an excellent job and did it in record time and with great care. I wasn't sure my items would fit in the storage once I saw it but the guys assured me it would work and it did with space to spare. I couldn't be happier! Thank you Christian, Isaac and Zack. I'll definitely be using you again for future moves.

name: Richard Simmons
text: Logan and Conrad were exceptional.  Punctual, efficient and friendly.  I will definitely hire MoveDaddy again.

name: Kristopher Mason
text: Start to finish, I've yet to have a better moving experience than with MoveDaddy. Getting a rate quote from and booking the move with Jered was simple. Mark and Izaak arrived shortly prior to our arranged meet time, and after walking them through the apartment, they got to work. By the time I'd finished breaking down a large bed, they'd already loaded everything else! At the new home, the unload was just as fast, with the occasional stop only to see where I wanted specific items placed. Since I wasn't breaking down a bed this time, I was able to see that although they'd loaded the truck quickly, my items had been packed and secured into the truck with care, and were unloaded with the same amount of care. These guys are good!

name: jean santamaria
text: Fantastic staff, Jared is one of the best in the business displaying punctuality and professional quality to the upmost knowledge. Highly recommend Birmingham  to use movedaddy!

name: Ryan Alexander
text: Had a last minute move and these guys were very accommodating with my schedule. Jenkins and Nick worked twice as fast and hard as any other movers I’ve ever used. Even assembling two bed frames and installing our washer/dryer. I don’t know where they find these guys but you would’ve never thought it was their second move of the day in 100 degree heat and humidity. Will 100% use again. Did in 6 hours what it took “Two Men and a Truck” to do in 13 for half the price.

name: Alyson Usher
text: Christian and Phillip were on time, respectful, and nice to have around. They worked hard from start to finish and used their time wisely. I was very impressed with their positive attitude and politeness. I would highly recommend them to anyone who is looking for movers! Will definitely use them again.

name: gina george
text: Made a call today to set up an appointment they were at my house in two hours to help move furniture around.  Nick and Phillip were polite and courteous wore a mask the entire time and patient with an older person.  Will use if we ever move to another house

name: Natalie Ferguson
text: JR and Zack were so helpful for my move! I moved out of a 3rd floor walk up and they moved all of my large and heavy furniture items. It was so impressive and they did such a great job. I would definitely recommend them and Move Daddy for your next move! Great job guys and thank you so much!

name: Sara Bryant
text: I could not ask for better service. Highly, highly recommend. Christian and Angel were great! Very fast and professional and made the move very easy!!

name: Becky Mullins
text: Our daughter got a new job in Birmingham and we were rushing to get things in place for her which was difficult since we live out of state. Found MoveDaddy online and they had just had a cancellation for the day we needed.  Whew!  Jacob and Zack were amazing!  They completely unloaded the BIG U-Haul truck for us and put everything where we asked them to.  It was SO hot that day and they had to move everything up to the 2nd floor. I highly recommend this company.  The young men were very friendly and respectful.  You can't go wrong with them! :)

name: LaDecca Wallace
text: Needed extra help unloading furniture from move to B’ham and to a 3rd floor apartment. Hired MoveDaddy to handle the heavy stuff. Jacob, Angel & Tanner were fantastic and very professional. Arrived ahead of schedule and were done in the time allotted. I would definitely use this business again and ask for the same group!

name: Cali Killian
text: Christian and Zack were great. Would use again!

name: Laura Bryant
text: Nick and Angel were great and got the job done quick! They were professional and able to get my furniture moved in a timely manner and handled everything with great care. Would highly recommend!!

text: MOVEDADDY IS A MUST!!!! After All My Sons (NEVER use them) was 2 hours late and then cancelled on us the day of our move, we frantically called MoveDaddy to see if they had any availability. Jared was SO nice, professional, and rearranged their moving schedule to fit us in. He kept us perfectly updated on their arrival times, answered any and all of my questions with a friendly attitude and when the movers arrived they were SO PLEASANT and courteous. THIS is how you run a business. I will be using them in the future and referring all family and friends. Thanks again MoveDaddy!!!

name: Rose Patterson
text: I would like to say Christian and Andrew were very professional and nice. They know what they’re doing when it comes to moving, nothing got damaged or scratched! I have a storage bed and they took it apart and put it back together perfectly. Thank you Christian and Andrew. 😃

text: Move Daddy was great! We had Dekoda, Tyler, and Luke and they were very professional and respectful. Never complained and did a fantastic job. Definitely recommend using these movers. Wish I could give them more than 5 stars.

text: I moved a few weeks ago and had a great experience with Move Daddy.  Jacob and Zack showed up on time and got straight to work.  They were very polite and professional. text: I had Jenkins, Andrew, and Ryan as my movers. They were incredible! They took such great care of all my stuff and were literally jogging back after they would drop something off in the truck. It was obvious that they were trying to be efficient. Also, I have a lot of very heavy and bulky furniture. They got this with ease and even put it all in the room it was supposed to go in. Such a huge help when it comes to unpacking! I have nothing but great things to say about this team! I would highly recommend!

It was worth every penny and I will absolutely be asking for them when we next need movers.

Very professional, hard working, didn't waste any time, and took great care with the piano. They had the 700 lb piano loaded, moved, and in place at the destination all in under 2 hours. I will definitely be calling MoveDaddy for my next move.

text: The best movers around hands down. They actually JOG when not moving your stuff. Plus they were incredibly considerate and careful with our things. Nothing was broken or damaged and they were super quick. I will definitely use them if we move again and recommend them to everyone!

name: Allison Phillips
text: My first experience with Move Daddy was while our home was for sale. We had to thin out some of our belongings which included our piano. As you might imagine we were nervous. The same men that moved our piano performed this move also. Again, same professional performance and really put our minds at ease. From our first contact to the last piece of furniture being moved we really couldn't ask for more. We would highly recommend Move Daddy.

text: I used Move Daddy for the first time today and was extremely pleased.  Ted and Tommy called when they were leaving the warehouse to let me know what time they would be arriving. My family and I will definitely be using Move Daddy again and recommending them to all of our friends.

They professionally packed the truck so that nothing moved around or was broken in the drive to the new house. The workers were clean cut, friendly, and always made us feel comfortable handling our prized possessions. I look forward to calling on Move Daddy when we move back to Birmingham.

text:
This is by far the best storage facility in the area. Primarily due to the staff. I park my vehicle here and use it every two weeks or so. When it’s cold outside and I park my car and awaiting my ride she always invites me in the office to stay warm, and when it’s hot outside and I’m awaiting my ride from dropping of my car at the Storage facility she offers water. Southern hospitality at its finest!!

One occasion battery died in my vehicle when I went to pick it up, and guess who was the only one on the shift...Lawanda Wood. She went out of her way to help, even providing me with jumper cables and using her own personal car to jumpstart my car, and did it with a smile! Without her I would have had to call a tow truck! She really saved the day!

I’m not sure if anyone will read this but I had to write a review and hopefully she is recognized and rewarded for her continuous outstanding work and customer Service at the Martin road location. Thank you for always going above and beyond for your customers. That’s why I pick this location over more fancy places. People like Lawanada make it worth it. :-)

Sincerely,
Your happy customer

Theron Lewis.

text:

name: Breonna Williams
text: Just price checking, seems like a nice place. The lady there was super nice and helpful. Will probably return to rent.

name: Dian Beaubien
text: Do not use this storage facility for Motorhome storage. I had my rv stored there 5 days.  In that short time, someone came in a cut my catalytic converter off causing me $1485 in damage.   They did say it was happening and was not the first.  But THEY are not responsible,  I’m filing a police report, but be very careful about your rv storage here.

name: Kevin Da King
text: Great place, great price, great customer service from both the guy and gal when I visit. John just broke down all the options I have for when I get my stuff out of storage this month and I didn’t even ask. Just volunteering the important extra information and going that extra mile for the customer. I highly recommend this place and the staff.

name: Deangelo Smith
text: The facility is well kept. Units are in great condition. The manager, Joel, was extremely helpful. Any question or concern I had, he had an immediate, reassuring response. This is my first time renting a storage unit and based off my experience I have nothing negative to say about this location or my experience. Two thumbs up!!

name: Eric Joyce
text: Unbelievably Great. Thank you John for fighting for the best deal for me. Thank you Brittany for your great service as well for my fourth unit. You both are great!!

name: Anne Hughes
text: Brittany and Sean were great! They are always so helpful every time I come in the office. I highly recommend!!

name: Blank Man
text: Great place to store your belongings. The staff is very friendly. I can't remember the name guy that is there majority of the time. Regardless this place is where you want to store your stuff and most importantly it's affordable.

name: Jessica Cunningham
text: Convenient location. Friendly staff. But they keep raising the rates and did nothing to get rid of the mice in my unit.  I had to personally get them out. Insurance didn't cover any damages and I am still having to enter my unit with caution because of the critters trying to move back in.

name: Amy Mansell
text: I can’t say enough about this facility. These guys are awesome! Year after year they donate a unit to the Tent City Project in efforts to help our city’s homeless community. Joel and his staff are simply amazing. If I could get them 10 stars, I would! I recommend over any other!

name: Latoya Herring
text: I was looking for the best prices that were near where my grandmother lives( the storage is for her), and decided to try this place. John went above and beyond for me. He showed me a space and gave me prices on said spaces, told me everything up front so that way there were no surprises. For that i will always be grateful thanks John for taking the time out for me and my questions.

name: John White RCDD
text: Great place. Great service. Clean units. Cameras and fence. Plenty of room. Average prices.

name: Chase Downing
text: Aislinn had a great attitude and was extremely helpful. I would highly recommend to friends or family.

name: Carolyn Hastings
text:
I moved to Alabama recently, and I rented a storage locker from LifeStorage on rte 72 in Madison on the enthusiastic recommendation from a neighbor who had previous experience with them.

First, the facility has everything you might expect, and then some.  It is super clean, well lighted and well paved.  The security is excellent, with 24/day 7 days/week access to the lockers through a security coded gate. Todd and Joel are extremely helpful, and do everything they can to make the experience go as smoothly as possible. In fact, I even got a phone call from Todd last week to let me know that my lock hadn't properly engaged the locking mechanism -- so they even check to make sure that the individual lockers are secure.

I have rented storage lockers at four facilities in three different states.  I liked each of the places I dealt with, but this is definitely the best.

Highly recommended.

name: Jason Troutman
text: They were very helpful and polite!  Also a very convenient and secure system. I would definitely recommend to a friend.

name: Tanya Murray
text: After searching many self storage units co-located to my rental, I stopped in here at lunch on Monday. Todd discussed the various rental sizes and costs associated, including insurance and then took me for a tour of the facility actually opening a vacant unit to verify the size I had inquired about. I went back the following day and rented a unit. If you are looking for exceptional customer service that is what you will get from these guys. Very helpful, units were clean and prices are reasonable. Glad I stopped.

name: Brad French
text: Nice lady, decent prices. Would recommend

name: Joe Velasquez
text: I was very impressed with the way Joel handled my inquiry.  Joel made sure I understood all aspects of renting a storage area.  He provided a tour of the facility including both external and climate controlled storage areas.  I rented my storage from Joel who is by far the best storage manager I have met.

name: Diana Tuten
text: Mr. Brian was extremely helpful and professional for my entire time I had my household goods in storage (4.5 years).  The facility was so clean and safe, which means a lot to me.  I felt so welcomed every time I stepped into the office--which was great! If I ever need a storage unit again I will most definitely put my goods in the units at this location!! 😉👍

name: FOR Rescue
text: As a not for profit, volunteer run animal rescue group, we often times have to rely on the generosity of area businesses. This facility helped us immensely during a recent shoe drive that we participated in. We couldn’t have done it without them. They were wonderful.

name: Dale Carter
text: Staff are courteous, professional, and helpful. Facilities are clean, well lit, and well maintained. Associated products are available at reasonable cost. Offers easy access to online maintenance of personal accounts.  Involves only a 5 calender day grace period before late payment fees apply. A reasonable extension to this grace period for established long term customers would personally gain a 6th star in future reviews:)

name: ac lopez
text: First time using storage facility, location was great and maintained very well. Joel provided an excellent tour and answered all questions with great detail. Highly recommended!

text: Despite being here for a short time, my experience was everything I needed and more. Ian and his staff were more than accommodating to my needs, and worked with me until my wife and I were ready to move into our new home. Rates are reasonable, and the facilities are clean and well lit. I would recommend these facilities to anyone looking for a quick solution or a long-term.
