name: John Wood
text: This is a great place to get storage, the facilities are clean and well kept, the staff are awesome and always there to help when needed.  They even went out of their way to check our motorhome after a wind storm so I didn't have to run down and look.  I'd recommend this place to anyone wanting storage space.

name: B Royer
text:
Brittany Higdon is the best manager to serve store #351 in 5 years! Having personal experience with the operations of this company, she has the potential to be a top performer. Having rented here off and on for more than a decade, she has raised the standards back to what they were in 2012. Keep up the good work and tweak the small things.
To customers, this is the best facility to rent from if you want peace of mind that your things are safe and will be cared for, rent at this location.  Life Storage, formerly Uncle Bob's is a wonderful company to work for and they care about their customer base! Shout out to Williamsville!

name: Nick Denny
text: Let me begin with the positive: lots of room to enter the lot and maneuver.  That's where the good ends...  There are significant gaps in important information given online as well as from the employees.   You must bring a paper copy of insurance, it seems easy and somewhat a reasonable request, but they don't tell you till you arrive to sign...you have to either leave to print it or call your insurance company to fax it.  Also there is no agreed truck usage at this location, in fact there is no truck, there is a van at another location and its not free, you have to pay $20 for the commercial insurance...though the employee told me my personal vehicle insurance would work...paper copy.  Lastly, the size of the unit is 'nominal' meaning they are rounding UP to 10'x10' from the actual 9'x9.5'.  If I hadn't already gone through the hassle of signing and paying for the unit already, I would go somewhere else...

name: B B
text: The employees and staff of Life Storage are wonderful in helping their local community like thru The Tent City Project.  Any company who is willing to help and benefit their communities is a business I would want to associate with and do business with. Thank you!

name: D Lifeform
text: Shopping around for almost anything these days is often exhausting, frustrating, and disappointing. Therefore, it was a most pleasant surprise to find that customer service is indeed alive and well at the LifeStorage store #351 on Highway 72 West, in Madison, AL.  I would like to sincerely thank Joel Sherman, Store Manager, and Brittany, for their professionalism, as well as their kindness.  The fabulous customer service I received absolutely tipped the scales in favor of my renting a storage unit here, rather than at a competitor's store.  I was also extremely impressed with how immaculate the facility is, both inside and out.  I am quite pleased with the entire experience I had here and look forward to my future dealings with Joel and Brittany.  Thank you!

name: Donna Morris

Ann was staff person who scolded me and then told me I was arguing when addressing her comments - she had been ok up until this occurred on the weekend of 7/25-26.........

(My comments were not succinct so hope this clarifies my review to indicate who & what upset me so you can take appropriate action.
Corporate policy price increases & low maintenance budget are the issues not this location per se, including Rita who's always been friendly & considerate or the personnel form Mobile who helped with the changeover to your company or the district manager - he even took time to fix my door a couple years ago...)

text: Very clean and easily accessible. Ann and Rita are very kind and helpful. Ann even jumped my car off for me when my battery died in the parking lot! I highly recommend them.

text: Very nice and clean facility.  Rita was very knowledgeable and made the lengthy process fairly simple.  It is also very close so made it more appealing.  I would recommend!

text: As soon as I reserved my unit online Ann gave me a phone call with more details and answered all of my questions! Rita gave me tour of my unit and helped me out with all of my paperwork and any other questions! Very reasonable pricing and so clean! I feel so comfortable storing my items here!

name: Dave Fountain
text: Very friendly, helpful and highly knowledgeable. The cleanest storage facility I've ever seen. Please save yourself time and call or stop in Public Storage in Gulf Shores right before the bridge in front of the airport.

name: Janie Williams
text: Thank you, Ann!!!! We Seniors need all the great help we can get,and you were that great help!!!!

name: Ronald Martin
text: Had occasion to work with  Ann and Rita to obtain a storage unit. Both were knowledgeable, courteous, helpful and a pleasure to do business with. The complex and individual units were clean and easily accessible. this is about the 5th time we have used storage units and by far the best experience!!!

name: Morgan Tidmore
text: Had a great experience. Rita was so sweet and  helpful. There wasn’t a question she didn’t know. Will definitely use again if needed

text: Rita was amazing! She is so friendly and helpful! She made the process seamless, easy and quickly!

text:
Ms.Ann has exceptional Customer Service ..knowledgeable ..clean facility ..definitely a good experience during a hectic move ..thank you. And just im amazed at how good she is at what she does and the person she is simply amazing.
WOW...

name: Jenny
text: Bait and switch. Cost to move in was SUPPOSED to be $25! I got there and was REQUIRED to buy a $20 lock from them. That got me to $45. Then they start rent at the first of the month...needless to say, I ended up paying TWICE the rate for 3 weeks worth of use. Holding my breath that my stuff isn’t stolen, because their lock can be picked by an expert they have on staff, so much for SECURE STORAGE!

name: Cynthia Jordan
text: The nicest and most qualified representative (Rita). Very clean and well run!

name: Lisa Gunter
text: Wonderful experience.  Ms. Rita was so kind and knowledgeable.  The facility was very clean and well maintained.

name: Wanda Ruth
text: Stopped in and picked up a few items from Ms. Debbie today. She was very polite and a pleasure to deal with.  Very knowledgeable about the products she sells. Will definitely be back if I’m ever in need of more boxes!!!

name: Jane Nelson
text: Came in to buy some packing products a few days ago and Lexi was the sweetest thing, she helped me get the right size packing paper and she mentioned that if I didn't need the box I was hesitant about buying she would be able to give me a refund if it was unused. She had such a great personality that I chose to come back today to pick up more paper and get some measurements on different sized boxes. Overall great experience and thank you for your knowledge and helpful advice! Will come again!

name: Charles Greer
text:
Facilities are nice, and onsite office staff are great!  HOWEVER...
BEWARE corporate "bait and switch" rates!  After six months, my online "deal" rate for my unit jumped from $89.00 to $104.00, an almost 17% increase.  Will the rate be $121.00 six months from now????

name: JULIE GREEN
text: Rita and Ann are very nice however the problem is the corporate office doesn’t care about people and situations!!  Evidently the people that moved out the bedroom furniture in the storage building left one thing and  for that Jennifer at the corporate office wants me to pay another $140 whatever..  they prorate only when you move in not when you move out!

name: Jessica Knight
text: Great customer service!! Will recommend highly!! Thank you to the lady  up front that worked with me!!

name: Don Carson
text: I moved here from Hernando Mississippi and needed two storage units . Rita was such a tremendous help in making that happen for me and so friendly when I got here. Just can't say enough about Rita going the extra mile.

name: April Barnett
text: Rita was very helpful and professional from beginning until the end. She answered every question and was able to get us what we needed to store our belongings.

name: Sue Schuler
text: I had to go into the office today to sign my new lease. The ladies that work in the office are just the sweetest things. The facility looks really nice with all the things that have been done. If you need storage I recommend the Gulf Shores location.

name: Joey Pease
text:
Great location and very  descent storage facility.The lady Ann was always very helpful and kind, unlike the last place i stored at.
That matters when you're irritated from moving stuff lol

name: John Pace
text: Rita was extremely helpful and made the process of renting a storage unit seamless and smooth.

name: Ron Eubank
text: Kudos to Rita at Gulf Shores! She helped me through an upgrade to a larger unit without any problems. I was already a satisfied customer, but every transaction counts and Rita shows that PS knows it.

name: SS S
text: The lady in the office was very helpful even with all my questions. I am giving the service I was given 5 stars. I made my reservation with the call center and was told what I would have to pay. I was NOT told I would have to purchase a lock and insurance. So I called my agent and everything was cleared up. The lock is a little hard to use but I feel like the security it offers is worth the price I paid.

name: Geremie Fresh
text: Mrs. Rita was wonderful. Thank you so much for all your help. I would highly recommend this location to anyone.

name: Lloyd Moore
text:
The folks that work their are great.  The facility is well maintained and clean.  They get two stars because of what I consider shady business practices by "Corporate".

I was just notified that the monthly storage rate was going up by 20%.  After some calls it seems like their units are staying full and there are "no special rates anymore".  We never knew we had a special rate.  It was the standard rate.

What they are doing is jacking up the rates in hopes folks will leave and they can get more for the units.  A 20% jump is a big increase for no reason at all.

name: Coralie Anne Farish Scott
text: Rented this morning. Rita was super nice & very informative. She made renting a unit here very easy. The unit itself is climate controlled and a code is required to get in the building and on the elevator which makes me feel safe about storing my belongings here.

name: Sherie Box
text: Great experience! Rita was courteous, helpful and friendly. She goes out of her way to make you feel welcome and informed!

text: Rita is wonderful to work with.

text: Nice friendly fast showed us the difference sizes by taking us to different units and letting us look inside to see if it would fit everything we had to store got us in today.

text: This store has the BEST customer service! Ann is always so helpful. I feel so confident leaving everyone. Thank you, Ann and Public Storage!

name: Sarah Hadley
text: My experience with  Ann was awesome she's so helpful and friendly and answered all my questions and took care of everything in a timely manner and the storages are so clean and well kept. If you need a storage unit go see Ann in Gulf Shores she will always greet you with a smiling face.

name: Charles McCleese
text: This is my second visit here to see a unit. Linda made me feel comfortable during the rental process. She answered all of my questions with confidence and made me feel at ease. Thank you so much for everything you did to make this as easy as possible.

text:
Mrs. Rita is amazing.

She goes above and beyond to help in anyway she can. You won’t need to worry about a thing when working with her. The facility was clean and well kept as well.

name: Ryan Patrick
text: I was truly impressed with how clean and nice the facility is. The young lady in the office was very patient with us as we decided if we wanted the unit or not. She was kind and sweet. Would recommend to my friends. Thank you.

name: J.D D
text: I want to say just how wonderful Rita and Linda are. I had a lot of trouble getting to Al but they made sure I had units when I got here. I am thankful for that. I am giving 5 stars to them. I wasn't happy about the insurance requirement or the lock purchase. However that wasn't their fault and they made it a smooth transaction.

name: Linda Oakes
text: The gals that are in the local office are outstanding, especially Ann.  The facility is very clean and well maintained.  My only complaint has to do with their price increases for no apparent reason.    We have had 3 price rate increases in 1.5 years, going from $130 to $150 to $182 ... I  believe their units are staying full, jacking up the rates in hopes folks will leave and they can rent at higher pricing.  We have been inconvenienced a few times, when they re-did the blacktop, we could not pull anywhere close to units, having to walk & carry, they closed a couple times with no email notice causing us to drive an hour only to find them closed!  I was more inline thinking we should get a credit for inconvenience.  We will be checking other locations/ as there are several new going up in the area but only because of price.  Give us a fair price break, for being a good customer and we stay.

name: Susie Collova
text: Rita was very pleasant, helpful and knowledgeable about her facility! Definitely would recommend this storage facility to my friends.

name: joey pease
text:
Thank you for great & fast service Ann.
I know my storage is in good hands!
Thank you

name: Brenda Perry
text: Terrific experience! Rita was able to work her magic and find space. Highly recommend!

name: Wendy Collins
text: I love this place, I felt like all of my belongings were safe and secure. TheTstaff was amazing! The  only thing that really upset me was when I told them I was moving out. It just so happened that I couldnt move in to my apartment until the 1st. So I went in to the office and they told me I would be charged for a whole month if I'm not out before the 1st,! I can't believe that they prorate if you move in in the middle of the month or whatever but if you move out they don't prorate even if it's only for one day you have to pay a whole month so I had to rent a U-Haul truck unload all of my stuff into a truck let it sit overnight and take it to my place to next day just so I wouldn't get charged for a whole month I think that's ridiculous!

I would advice going elsewhere Bec Public Storage will steal your money and way over charge you and do not pay up on the unit and move out they will keep your money..

text: Armstrong moved our business for us and did an amazing job. They were professional, hard workers, and so easy to work with. Highly recommend for a commercial move!

name: Pinson Patriot
text: It is Very clean and professionally ran. Mr D Hayes, the manager, is a five star person and manager...

name: Evelyn Gray
text: These people were hired to move students out of a residence hall at UAB and they showed no care towards my things and threw them in boxes with no rhyme or reason along with trash and now I have broken dishes and a crumpled certificate and wrinkled posters that I have had for years and I am incredibly upset with the treatment given. Be on alert if you are not directly involved with them moving you, because they have ruined things that had no reason to be ruined.

name: Jami Burns Richards
text: I do not recommend this company for relocating anyone. They showed up late every day and left early, which resulted in a major time crunch and rushing on the very last loading day, in which we had a deadline to meet and needed to leave town. They dropped an entire cabinet shelf of spices on our stove and broke it- which they did replace. They wrote up that nearly every piece of furniture we own was damaged in some way or another then argued and got impatient when we were hesitant on signing off that our furniture was "predamaged", I'm positive that is to cover themselves when they damage your property. We opened boxes to many broken items, and I'm nervous to see what our Christmas decoration damage will be. The demolished a table, and we have a mysterious chip of paint in my brand new car from the day they rushed our unload in our driveway and were quickly maneuvering around it. This company is majorly disappointing.

name: T Beck
text:
We used Armstrong Relocation to pack and move my mom. I wish I could give them 10 stars! Our experience with this company was absolutely outstanding. The crew that came to pack/move my mom were all consummate professionals, extremely hard-working, had such a positive attitudes, handled my mom’s belongings with the upmost care, all while having a huge smiles on their faces.

The sales and customer service representatives were an absolute pleasure to deal with. We had to make a last-minute date change for my mom’s move, and the Armstrong Relocation team handled this last minute change as if it were no inconvenience or issue for them whatsoever. They were just eager to help with whatever we needed.

It was clear to me that this company has created a culture in which their employees are extremely proud to represent their brand and do it very well.
Without question, I would not only recommend Armstrong Relocation, I would use them again in a heartbeat.

Thanks for the great serving Armstrong Relocation!

#customerserviceexcellence

text: Renter beware!! Was not told at time of rental, but the they have price increases every 6 to 12 months, last one was 12% increase, that can get expensive over a long period of time, so just be prepared for that if you decide to rent here in case they fail to tell you that or it’s buried in the rental contract and you miss reading it.

resp.text:
Hello Mickey, we are sorry to hear about your experience while renting with us. While we do occassionally increase our rates, this is done to provide a better experience to our customers by way of improvements made to facilities and covering increases to maintenance costs. We always take great care when raising rates to ensure that they happen as infrequently as possible, and with impact as dictated by the market. Even with that, we always try to provide the smallest possible increase. If there is anything we can do to assist you further, please reach us at feedback@istorage.com.

Sincerely,
The iStorage Decatur - Deere Rd Team

text: Just moved to Alabama and needed to store my belongs. Istorage was great, had the right storage unit for my needs. The manager; Rita, she was great. Thanks for making me feel like I was coming home.

name: Ali Franks
text: If this storage building wasn’t the only one near by I would have rented somewhere else. The manager is rude and yelled at my movers whenever they were dropping my belongings off at my unit. There were items left over from the last tenant that the manager said she was going to get out and never did. They also rented the unit I had reserved online without even calling me about it. They are expensive for what you get. Also be aware that the price of your unit is not a fixed rate like they tell you and it is subject to change (not disclosed whenever you start renting). They also tell you they prorate a month if you were moving out, what they don't tell you is that they only prorate if you are out by the 5th of the month.

resp.text: Hi Ali, the staff at iStorage Priceville take our reviews very seriously and we appreciate you taking the time to share your concerns with us. It is thanks to feedback like yours that we can tackle issues that may impact our most valuable asset; our customers. I have sent your comments to the management at iStorage Priceville for review. We look forward to serving you in the future. If there is anything more we can do to improve your experience please email us at info@istorage.com or give us a call toll-free at 844-311-2342. Best Regards, the iStorage Team.

name: Lilly P
text: AWESOME EXPERIENCE. SAFE SECURE LOCATION. Five Star customer service! I had to put my things in storage for a bit, moving from one state to another. Basically my entire life was in that storage unit, and it’s hard to TRUST that all your things are going to be ok. Naturally I think of every worst case scenario, flooding, theft, mice. I chose this facility because it is gated, well lit, secure, and the website says the manager lives on site. I paid extra for the air-conditioned unit, and it was very easy to load my things into. When I moved my things out 2 weeks early… I got a phone call from Christy. Asking if I was permanently moved out… That thoroughly impressed me for a variety of reasons. A) they proactively reached out to me to ensure my stuff was OK & to make sure I was ok with turning auto-pay off. How many companies would just bill you for another month and hope you forgot to cancel? Also, when I asked how she knew I moved out the night before, they said they walk the grounds every morning and inspect every unit to make sure there wasn’t damage. If I ever need a storage unit again in the future, I will absolutely use this place. That gave me such a great feeling that my things are secure, and to know they’re inspecting every single unit every day. That’s awesome. You can definitely trust this place with your stuff!

resp.text: We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback, Lilly. We know that your items are important to you, so we make it a priority to provide a safe and secure self-storage experience. It’s important to us that you feel appreciated as our customer; we are here to help at 888-STORAGE if anything comes up.

name: Christin French
text: AWESOME EXPERIENCE. FRIENDLY CUSTOMER SERVICE. I rarely take the time to write reviews but I had to share my experience! I had to put my things in storage for a bit, moving from one state to another. Basically my entire life was in that storage unit, and it’s hard to TRUST that all your things are going to be ok. Naturally I think of every worst case scenario, flooding, theft, mice. I chose this facility because it is gated, well lit, secure, and the website says the manager lives on site. I paid extra for the air-conditioned unit, and it was very easily accessible and easy to load my things into. When I moved my things out 2 weeks early… I got a phone call from Christy. Asking if I was permanently moved out… That thoroughly impressed me for a variety of reasons. A) they proactively reached out to me to ensure my stuff was OK & to make sure I was ok with turning auto-pay off. How many companies would just bill you for another month and hope you forgot to notify them? Also, when I asked how she knew if I moved out, they said they walk the grounds every morning and inspect every unit to make sure there wasn’t damage. If I ever need a storage unit again in the future, I will absolutely use this place. That gave me such a great feeling that my things are secure, and to know they’re inspecting every single unit every day. That’s awesome. You can definitely trust this place with your stuff!

name: Kyle E
text: This morning I was looking for a place to store unnessisary items that I do not need or use at all. While I am a college student I wanted a place to store my items to make my appartment a happy livable space. Today I went to store 8477 and met a very lovely associate named April Goodman and while  I was there she treated me not only as a customer, but it welt like during the our time felt like family. When I asked to see the 5' by 7' we looked at the unit and it was not something i was looking for. However when she suggested a 5' by 15' we needed to walk to the very far building on the property to view the unit. Ms. April recommended the golf cart. I told her we did not need to use it since it is a beautiful day out and it would be a nice walk to get exercise. As walking down I told her I might not like the 15' size and asked about the 5' by 8' and that it was the last one available and that we needed to walk back to the main building to see it. As we were walking to the last building she asked if I still wanted to see the 15 footer and I asked her please. When we walked back to the 5 by 8 room I walked in it and i felt in love with the space that it had its own light and also own air vent. I told her it was sold and we went back to the office and did all the paper work and I am now renting a air controlled 5' by 8' and so far I love it. As I was loading my unit an hour ago I loaded a car load in the unit then walked to the office to ask a question. As I opened the door to the office I was looking into the office smiling and as I was walking in Ms. April's office phone rang and Ms. Lechelle in the desk right next to her asked me how can i help you. As I was walking in I did not notice Ms. Lechelle asking me that question. So as I continued walking into the office Ms. Lechelle rudely asked me how may I help you. I asked my question and left the office not happy with the tone she was talking to me in as a paying customer. I do not appresiate that at all. Next time I go to the office to get help I will only make sure that I only ask miss april for help no matter if there are 2 people in the office or if she is off I will only work with her. Overall I love the facility and I would gladly recommend it to my friends and family if they ever need any storage rooms. But because of the rude experience I will only rate this 4 stars!!!!!!!!!

resp.text: Hi Kyle, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We aim to provide the highest level of customer service and are thrilled to hear your experience with April reflects that! We're delighted to hear you are so happy with the storage unit you rented! Providing a positive experience for each of our customers is very important to us and we hope to better serve you next time you visit the office. Your recommendation means a lot to us. Thank you again for leaving us a review! Don't hesitate to give us a call at (256) 461-0235 or stop by our office if you need anything in the future!

resp.text: Hi Jacob, Extra Space Storage works hard to provide value for our customers through competitive pricing and by maintaining clean, safe, and secure facilities with the best customer service in the self storage industry. From time to time, we make adjustments to our customers’ rental rates to keep up with the rising costs associated with providing top-notch service and a clean, secure facility. If you would like to discuss this with us in more detail, we're available anytime at 888-storage.

name: David Warren
text: There is a muscular guy with a light beard. Dude, you don't belong there. Crawl back into your mommy's basement. Stay there, don't ever come out. This world is better off without you.

name: David Allain
text:
Started my journey with renting a UHAUL truck and trailer two weeks before the move. Megan was very knowledgeable and helped me make the right truck size choice. Unfortunately, the uhaul reservation system was down that day so I reserved from home later that week.

For some reason the “traffic” division of UHAUL that is not based in Auburn changed my reservation the day before and I was going to have to go to Phoenix City to pick up a truck, and Opelika to pick up the trailer. Ended up working with Hunter King and Hugh three times in one day, the day before the rental pickup date, to iron out my issues.

Hunter gave the info for traffic try and get it sorted out, which eventually did work. There wasn’t anything he could do to add my reservation to the store because they were out of truck. By an act of God someone canceled later and I got the truck I needed at this location. Then “traffic” moved it again..

Needless to say. Hunter K. was knowledgeable, patient, and extremely helpful in getting the reservation squared away again and even helped add an extra day to my reservation so I could get the truck immediately.

11/10 recommend this store because of the employees Megan, Hunter K., and Hugh.

I say everything here to show you how much of a hassle it can be to reserve online. If you can reserve in-person at this store it will save SOOO many headaches.

War Damn Eagle

name: Tuyen_2000
text: Paperwork got messed up and I got charged for 460 miles instead of the 30 I did. Seem to think it's perfectly fine to do 460 miles in six hours and refuse to refund the couple hundred dollars they overcharged. Just rent a truck, don't come here.

name: joy G
text:
Best service Ever. Megan is the best
She is so friendly and helpful
I would like to give more than 5 stars
Box Truck rental was efficient and well run.
Fast and efficient. Customer service courteous and professional.
Highly recommended

name: Amber K
text: They are the absolute worst! I've never met a set of ruder people in my life. If you can't go to another uhaul location just pick Budget or Penske and save yourself the headache.

name: Jerry F
text: Megan is the best.  Never expected such friendly and incredible service when I needed help moving my son in to college.  Thank you so much for your help Megan.  You made my day and my week easier.  Highly recommend.

name: Nick Britton
text: Super friendly and helpful staff. I had to go into the store multiple times and interacted with several different people. They were all courteous.

name: Mohammadnaser Ansari
text: I had some issues with the truck and the roadside assistance was completely useless. They did not have any service available in Auburn at the time (near downtown). However, the lady in charge of the store was exceptionally helpful (didn't get the name). The only reason I will rent again is only for the great customer service in the store.

name: Pierce M
text: Hunter is a great employee. Super helpful and a good communicator which made renting / returning a breeze.

name: N Stovah
text: Hunter was excellent. Very friendly and knowledgeable. Deserves a big raise.

name: Leonard Sloan
text: Quick fast and easy service

name: Laurie Hillanbrand
text: A No Show. We made a reservation for a Move In date for a Saturday. The woman who took the information said they are no longer open on a Saturday, but she would make the exception for this time. She gave us her personal cell phone number and asked if we would call 15 minutes before arrival and she would meet us to sign the paper work. We did just that, no one picked up, but we left a message. We arrived with a dorm room full of stuff to store for the summer and we called again, no answer. The sign on the door of the office said they were closed but to call the number (her number)AND the national number, which is what we did. The Representative for the national number said the U-HAUL company doesn't allow their storage buildings to close on a Saturday and that they couldn't do more to help us. So while we waited for a return phone call, we started looking at other storage places near by and STOR-EAGLE Storage was able to accommodate us with no problems! At the time of this review it has been almost 5 hours since we left a message at U-HAUL Moving & Storage of Auburn and we still did not get a return phone call. Make a reservation at your own risk.

name: Rachel Sugg
text:
My husband and I chose to use Uhaul for our move because it was the best affordable option. For future moves we will do everything we can to avoid working with them again.

After making a reservation a month in advance, we found that our truck had been double booked and watched it be given to someone else right in front of us. When asked for some kind of alternative or assistance, the man who was supposed to be helping us simply told us, “That’s too bad,” and that we could call the national Uhaul line. Because our state is becoming overwhelmed with COVID-19 cases, we used the Uhaul app to check in and pick up the truck. However, the man helping us said that we should have come inside (where not a single employee was masked) if we wanted the truck. We understand that this situation may not have been this individual’s fault, but his behavior made our situation even more distressing, as he was quite rude, even belligerent, and made no attempt at an apology for this very disruptive mistake.

This mixup has made our lives very difficult, and we were sorely disappointed in the employee’s attitude toward us. In the future, we will not be using Uhaul, and from now on we will be warning others about this.

name: Chelsea Clayton
text: I have rented uhaul trailers before but I have never had an experience like this one! The employees absolutely knocked my socks off!! Brandon, Megan, and Blake have absolutely made this experience the best I have ever had.  I will definitely come back to this location for all my rental needs!!

name: Space Cadet
text: Great service and very friendly. Have dropped off Uhauls twice here in the past month.

name: Corey Harris
text:
We waited in the store for 10 mins until
Someone walked in from the back to help. We did the scan and go on the app, and the man still wanted to verify our items and print a confirmation. Why do scan and go if you have to wait in line anyways?

name: Gopal Nath
text: I reserved 15’ truck.  Before  picking up they assigned me 26’  truck instead,  saying that 15’ not available.

name: Zongru Han
text: Worst service ever, staff is rude and they wouldn’t talk to you for more than 10min

name: Jose Torres
text: Uhaul's online booking system made some major errors on my booking, but I had a ton of time-saving help from the staff at this location. They helped me get the correct size truck for my move.

name: Cal Warriner
text: Could not have been better. Guy behind counter was quick and efficient. Guy who hooked trailer up just as good. In and out in 20 minutes including purchase of wardrobes, tape, boxes and part for hitch.

name: William Paris
text: Megan was very helpful and the store had everything I needed. Thank you. I wasn't expecting such a pleasant experience.

name: James S
text: Unable to complete reservation because "keys were lost by last person to use the van." First, there should be duplicates. Second, I was called the morning I was supposed to move. Why even bother guaranteeing something that is not there? After cancelling my reservation and having me go around town looking for a same-day, 3x more rental, the location did not even tell me about the U-Haul program that gives partial reimbursements for failed guarantees.

name: Paramjit “Perry” Kahai, PhD
text:
The rep who assisted me at this store is a tall, bearded man.  As soon as he handed me the truck, I took a picture of the odometer. On the contract, he had mileage out that was lower than what I saw before I started moving. The mileage out should be the odometer mileage when the truck is handed to the customer, not the mileage that may be on their records when the truck was returned by a previous customer.

Also, unknown to me, there was a dolly in the back that I had not even reserved.  I saw it only when I opened the back to load my stuff.  I was surprised, to say the least and wondered if I will be billed for it. Guess what?  I was billed for it even though I had not used it. And how did he know that I had used it? When I called this morning, he told me that the plastic tab that was attached to the dolly was broken. When I try to assure him that I had not even touched the dolly, his response was rude and something like "we have a lot of customers who say they didn't use the dolly but they actually did." In short, he had just accused me of lying!  My question is: why was the dolly even there in the first place? I had not reserved it!  And if there was something in the back of the truck, he should have opened the back and shown it to me.  I would have asked for the dolly to be taken out. Further, how do I know that tab wasn't broken before the truck keys were handed to me? So, this was a clear case of an attempt to cheat a customer.  I wonder how many people this store rep has cheated.  Next time, if I ever rent again from this location (which I very much doubt) or any other, I will make certain to open the back and have them remove any extra stuff I did not order!

Any attempts at talking with the rep over the phone was met with rude, curt, and insulting responses.  The phone call was recorded by the location, so that will provide evidence of whether I am telling the truth about the rep's attitude and lack of respect towards me.

BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU RENT A TRUCK AT THIS LOCATION. INSPECT EVERYTHING BEFORE YOU LEAVE AND HAVE THEM REMOVE EVERYTHING YOU HAD NOT RESERVED.

name: Shari Belton
text: The General Manager greets you at the door. I had a reservation to pick up a trailer for my son and later found out it wasn't needed. The store was able to refund my money within two days, even though I purchased a one-way rental. Be sure to stop by there for all of your rental needs!

name: John Parker
text: Without a doubt, the most unprofessional outfit of workers I've ever witnessed behind a single desk. My sister went into the store to complete the very routine process of accessing her storage unit. However, unbeknownst to her or anyone else, they were full and instead rerouted her reservation to Georgia. This information was not even gathered until they second attempt to receive help from the desk, for the first time we spoke to their general manager, Tavon Scott, who was at the moment in no mood to do his job. As soon as he saw that our last name did not come up in the computer, he looked at us as if we were crazy and then proceeded to profusely rid himself of all blame ("it was the call center") and yelled at us for becoming frustrated at the fact that we seemingly had no storage. He was completely unwilling to make up for the fault of his company in any capacity and did nothing but sit there and act annoyed at our frustration. I dropped by one last time to use the restroom and I could hear them quoting us and laughing at our situation until they saw I had come in. I was so disgusted at their attitude about their job that I marched up to the desk to get Mr. Scott's full name to write in this report, to which he replied, laughing "You can just look up my name if you need it." I replied "take care" and he replied "oh I will take care" and continued to murmur something under his breath to the amusement of his coworkers. I've never held an official job to this date, but if I talked half as rudely to any customer as they did to us, I'd expect to be canned on the spot, and that's exactly what I wish upon this man, Mr. Scott. I'd equate this crew to a group of shiftless, gawky teenagers who are too immature to own up to their own shortcomings. Simply put, these insolent fools don't know how to represent a company and don't appreciate the name stitched onto their shirt. They've made a decision to be bad at what they do. One star for knowing English.

name: Mark Gallagher
text: My reserved trailer was rented to another person which sent it over 90 miles away.   However, since we all remained calm; they worked with us and gave us a 17 foot truck which worked out so much better than a small trailer.  It had better gas milage, great air conditioning, and we didn't need to pay extra for a logistical error.  Thanks guys at Auburn U-Haul for making my move stress free and helping out even though you really didn't need to....

name: Christopher Abreu
text: I had reserved a truck a month in advance, only to have it redirected from this location to another 45 minutes away the day before my move. They claim they were “overbooked”, even though they confirmed the reservation to me over the phone earlier in the week, and was not updated online until after the email. Calling the office takes you to their call center, where you either get someone that is willing to help or someone that hangs up on you. I would not recommend bringing your business here, as the overall experience was unprofessional, sloppy, and infuriating.

name: Whitney Mullins
text: I reserved a self-storage climate control unit with U-Haul on February 1st. I kept the email confirmation and went by to make sure everything was in order so my roommate could begin moving their stuff into storage. After twenty minutes of waiting in line I showed them the email and asked how to go about getting access to the unit since I had never done this before. The man looked up everything and said I was nowhere in the system. I showed him the confirmation and everything that was needed and he said he was sorry, but there was nothing he could do. The manager came out and said that they have not had the climate control storage for over two months now. I told him I have had the unit reserved since February and received no notice that anything was changed. I even called two days ago checking to make sure and the lady said everything was fine. I asked them if they could help me out because I had to find somewhere to put the items because I have to be moved out by noon tomorrow and cannot move into my new place until August 15. They said they could not help me and turned me away. I will never use the company of U-Haul again. There was only one storage unit available in the city of Auburn, and it was at Uncle Bob's storage. The only reason they had it available was because someone cancelled an hour before I called. Thank goodness for that.

name: Randy Mauldin
text:
I rented a 26' truck today. You double billed my credit card. I should have known that you were a disreputable business when Michael asked me for my credit card without quoting me a price. Since you are a monopoly I guess you think that people will pay any amount of money to rent a truck.
He then quoted me a price which I agreed to. I found out when I picked up the truck that he conveniently failed to tell me that there is a hidden fee of $0.99 a mile. WOW, now you have added $80 in hidden fees.
I started to cancel the reservation but then I remembered that you are the only place that rents moving equipment. I had to move so I was stuck with the extortion.
Since you are greedy bastards, you decide to go ahead and stick it to me. You double billed my credit card to make up for the frustration of dealing with an unhappy customer.
Rest assured that this isn't the end of the case. I will contact my credit card company and I will make sure that all of the milage charge is reversed as well as the double billing. When you quote a price, you must honor it.

name: Casten FIscher
text: I use this place frequently to get trailers for hauling things.  They usually have the trailers I need, and they are usually quick to get me in and out.  I have been to other uhaul centers who are not helpful at all, so it is refreshing to go here.

name: Gullatte Acres
text: I dropped off a trailer and had excellent service.

name: Elliott Wood
text: Staff doesn't know squat about their products. The lady on the phone said i would need to buy transmission fluid for my trailer hitch. Recommend a different dealer.

name: nicole gathe
text: Brad was great! He got us in and out when we picked up and returned. No issues with prices or quotes. A+

name: Jared Hawsey
text: Rented a trailer and they were very nice and quick. In and out in a flash

name: Jerrell Knight
text: Worst customer experience I EVER had. Customer service rep did not want to do his job and tried to stale so he wouldn't have to do his job.

name: Andypatt43
text: Went into store to get wiring for my trailer hitch.  After about 30 mins and no employees in the store to help the 5-7 people that had accumulated behind me in line.  When the guy came back out to help me he said I must talk to installation tech.  When the tech came out bout 10 mins later he proceeds to tell me that I can't make a reservation in the store I had to do it on-line.(just to get me out if store I think).     After calling customer care they told me this was absurd u must make appointment in store.  So long story short their a bunch of lazy people that wanna do nothing.  They also told me that it would take an hour, but the service rep on phone said 4 hours and would be $210.00 plus parts and wire.   Called CTU(CUSTOM TRUCKS UNLIMITED) RIGHT up the street and they install for $125.00 parts and all.  Never ever using these morons again. And the tech should be reprimanded for lying to customer to get out of work!  Never going back.  Customer service goes along way and they have None!

name: Curtis Keller
text: Nice team.  Very customer centered

name: Garrett Vickery
text: Van rental was easy and pretty quick. Returned it afterhours and didnt have to go through any sort of checkin process.

name: Felecia Brock
text: They have alot to offer when moving.

name: Gerry Hicks
text: Made a reservation for a uhaul truck and they did not honor it. Then after I called them out for there wrong doing they took no blame. At least if you are going to not honor a reservation own up to it.

name: Ethan Parker
text: They said I had a truck (I reserved 3 weeks in advance), then they changed the size I was set to pick up, upped the rate, then said they didn't have a truck. Do not waste your time.

name: jerrilynn freeman
text: If you want to move in town or out of town or even out of state they have a plan for you. Ask about there one way drop off

name: Seyun Oh
text: The hitch was carelessly done and the wire was torn. It has been only a week and I didn't even get to use it once. Very disappointing and time consuming that it need to get fixed.

name: Emily Hamilton
text: Went to return a vehicle and waited over 45 minutes for anyone to even come to the counter to help me.

name: Brenda McCarthy
text: Recommend to EVERYONE

name: Amelia Trenga
text: Came in day of and they accommodated us well

name: Debra Abu-Dames
text: Friendly staff...above and beyond.

name: Kathryn McCoy
text: Not enough staff on high volume days.

name: kromel03
text: Employees argued with us that a 2013 f150 (with an 8000lb uhaul installed tow package) weighed less than 3000 lbs.

name: Kimberly April
text: I had the best moving experience with Armstrong Relocation. From the personal coordinator to the moving crew, and the customer service rep were honest and took well care of my personal items. I really liked the fact that they inventoried all my items and made sure nothing was broken during the relocation. They took the stress out of moving for me. I will use Armstrong for my next move!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5-star rating! We are so happy to hear you had a wonderful move experience with us.

name: Diana Will
text: I was SO impressed with the quality of work Armstrong relocation provided for my family. They were prompt, funny, organized and communicative! I would HIGHLY recommend this company for your move. I hope I don’t have to move again- ever, but if I do, I’m using them again! ❤️

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words and positive review. Please let us know if we can be of any assistance in the future.

name: alisa Belcher
text: The team at Armstrong Relocation is the best of the best! I never had to worry about any details of my move - they came in and took care of everything ! The care and attention given to protecting my furniture was incredible! They were professional and made the move fun with such great attitudes! They had me packed and moved a day ahead of schedule because of their work ethic ! So worth every penny !!!

resp.text: We love being a part of such an exciting time in our customers’ lives. Thank you for sharing your experience, and if we can ever help you again, please don’t hesitate to contact us.

name: Darius
text: Very Friendly Staff, Nice Easy Unload Process

resp.text: Darius, thank you for sharing your experience with us! We are always so pleased to hear of another positive encounter with our team. Thank you for choosing Armstrong!

name: Trey Pollard
text: Armstrong Relocation was incredible. Nate and his crew were working from the time they showed up. They handled everything with care and worked quickly and efficiently. I recommend booking your next move through Susanna Moore with Armstrong Relocation in Birmingham. She was honest, responsive and quoted a very fair price. She also made sure to check on us the day of the move to ensure everything went smoothly. We cannot thank them enough.

resp.text: Hi, Trey! We’re happy to hear you had a great move. Thanks for sharing your feedback. We’ll be sure to share your comments with our team. Best of luck in your new home!

name: Keith Cooper
text: Always ready when I need them.

resp.text: We are always happy to help! Thank you for the kind review.

name: Valerie Hanson
text:
Armstrong Relocation did a fantastic job moving my family into our brand new home!  The customer service I received from Suzanna and her team was top of the line from start to finish.

On moving day, Jamal and his crew arrived on time, had a positive attitude, and eager to work.  I don't know how they did it, but they made moving seem fun!  I was very pleased with my entire experience, and appreciate Armstrong for making my move stress free.

Thank you, Armstrong!

resp.text: Valerie, Thank you so much for your kind words. It's great to know that Susanna and Jamal and our Armstrong people made your move stress free and enjoyable. It's nice to know their hard work is appreciated!

name: chris cochran
text: The movers were excellent. They were fast, professional, and helpful throughout the entire process.

resp.text: Chris, we're glad to hear everything went well and you were pleased with your move. We know that moving can be stressful and I'm glad our team could put you at ease. Thanks for the great review.

name: Pami Arthur
text: My first experience with this. I was not impressed. I was missing a box that was labeled tv. There was trash left all over my yard, they couldn't get my couch in. They were suppose to unpack,they didn't. Now I have to find a way to get rid of all these boxes. On the few things they did assemble he complained on how bad he hated that part of the job. It was just a terrible experience.

resp.text: Pami, we are sorry about the experience with your delivery, and as we discussed, will be back to pick up your boxes and debris on Monday. Please call me to discuss any future concerns.

name: Charles Sirna
text: My interstate move could not have been better, everything went smooth, everything arrived unblemished - [except for one flat screen that evidently got "bumped" - but this was handled with aplomb as well, with a check in the mail in 5 days]  - they were not the least expensive, nor were they the most, but based on my experience  - I would recommend them without reservation

resp.text: Charles, Thank you so much! We love to hear that our Van Operators and crews have made the moving experience a good one for valued people like you!

name: Graham Dougherty
text: We used this company for a commercial move and they did a great job. Very professional and they took their job seriously. They went above and beyond and even corrected my packing. 5 stars!

name: Bill McVay
text: Moving is stressful and Armstrong Relo made it easier. Our move was not easy involving gathering and moving between three different locations before making the long move to the final destination. It involved some unique issues and it was all scheduled without a hitch. We have done several moves and this one rates as the easiest even though we gave them a hard move to coordinate.

name: Ajay Kasi
text: I had to make a long distance move from the West Coast to the East Coast and I used Armstrong relocation. The senior move coordinator  contacted me and promptly scheduled a pre-move home survey. They provided a very reasonable estimate. The move date and time was also flexible and convenient. The movers came home and packed everything in boxes and were very professional. All my items arrived undamaged to my new home and the move-in team was very efficient and courteous. They set the boxes and furniture in the requested rooms. Throughout the process, the move coordinator, Truc Hayes, was always courteous, professional and accessible by phone/ email and would work alongside my schedule. Overall, I am very satisfied with their service and would recommend them to my friends and family.

name: Michael Wilkinson
text: Armstrong was professional, timely, and efficient. They packed, shipped, and delivered exactly according to our schedule which was a huge blessing when moving across the country. Highly recommend this organization.

name: Melisa Rhodes
text: The absolute best!!!  Professional and treated our possessions with the greatest respect.  They almost made moving pleasant.

name: Mary Bea Sullivan
text: We had a complucatd double move. The Armstrong team was amazing!! Accommodating and kind.

name: TruckinWoman
text: I'd give this company -100 stars if at all possible! As a truck driver, who delivered for this company to unload a homeowner's belongings. The crew was very unprofessional. And they lie. First off it was an 8 am delivery. I got there at the address at 8:05. Sat on the side street for about 30 mins, then called them. We are 5 minutes away they said. After another 45 minutes, I called again. We are 2 lights away now they said. 30 more minutes passed before they showed up, 2 hours late! The home owner asked them why you so late? Their answer, Traffic! Then the crew started bickering about one guy taking a break when the other 2 didn't, right in front of the home owner. Plus they hinted to me for a tip. Hell I'm the truck driver, it's not my place to tip them, so they got mad, and left all their trash, (which their SUPPOSE to dispose of themselves, including their water bottles and sweat rags) I called their boss and asked him to get back to me, on how unprofessional they were, but it's been 3 days and he hasn't and probably won't. Stay clear of this unprofessional relocation mover!

name: Amber Nicole
text: So helpful! And SUCH a clean warehouse. Thanks guys!

name: Johnny Fleming
text: Not to bad. Quick loading.

resp.text: Thank you for your positive rating and feedback!

name: Craig Wilder
text: Friendly People...

resp.text: Hi, Craig! Thank you for your kind review and happy holidays!

name: Daryl Isbell
text: Great company!

name: Sherita Gunter
text: Great

name: Joe L Gerald
text: attentive careful employees!

name: Diana Lynn Busacca
text: Very well kept, clean and secured facility. On site bathroom. Good lighting throughout. Staff very friendly,  professional and personable.  Ive been using this storage facility for 2 plus years. Never a problem.  They make making a payment very easy and convenient either by phone during business hours or anytime on line. name: Ken Coale
text:
This is a great place to store your stuff. The place is located on Hwy. 59 South, just south of Foley on your way to Gulf Shores. What I liked most was the friendly, courteous, and professional service from the manager, Coach Larry Keyes. He was very attentive to our needs and got us in a unit that was just right for what we wanted in a climate controlled storage unit. Coach was very professional in his dealings with us and completely explained how everything worked from the hours to the helpful hints on getting the proper size for our "stuff." I also liked  how clean the entire place was and the rolling carts were a lifesaver in getting the heavy boxes we had to put in our unit. We are very pleased with our choice to move from the "other" place down the road, just North of where we are now. Additionally, Uncle Bob's has a pretty neat and simple web site you can use to help you remember little things like, when your payment is due. Doesn't hurt to have a little reminder occasionally, you know. Oh, and the Coach is a big time football fan, too. When I'm not so busy, I'll go by and check on him and his team........Thanks.
Ken Coale

name: Glenn Riggs
text: Blackbox self storage is an amazing facility. Great management, works with you to take care of your needs. Renting and move in are simple because Jesse does whatever it takes to accommodate your move in or out. The facility is clean and well lit. The security both video and individually alarmed units allow you peace of mind.  24 hour access as well as many great occupants make it an awesome experience. It’s the only storage I’ve ever used that has a light switch rather than a timer, also has an outlet in the unit and access to water nearby. I just can’t say enough about this business. They treat you as friends and help in any way possible. I’ll certainly use them again if needed and tell everyone about them. Thanks so much Jesse.

name: Lauren Hardison
text: We rented a climate controlled unit for right at a year after we sold our house. The owner is super friendly, but the security and cleanliness is what won me over!! The automatic security that each unit has with the main gait relieved my fears of anyone breaking into our unit. It’s very well lit, so anytime I needed to go in the evenings I had absolutely no worries! Would certainly recommend this for all your storage needs!!

text: I was looking for a place to store some items when I came across Metro Self Storage. This amazing young man; I think his name is Aaron Brooks. Aaron showed me the perfect unit that would fit my needs. Aaron was very very nice and patient with me as I was confused about whether or not this unit would fit all my things. I would recommend Metro Self Storage to anyone who needs to Storage any of their belongings.

resp.text: Hi Toniesha, thank you for your kind review; we are happy to pass along your comments to the team here at Metro Self Storage! Your recommendation means so much to us and we're so happy to have earned it. Thank you for taking the time to let the world know about your positive experience. Have a great day!

name: Leslie Wade
text: This facility is very nice and clean. I get excellent service every time I speak to someone.    I would definitely recommend this comptroller anyone looking for a storage unit!

resp.text: Leslie, thank you for your kind review; we are happy to pass along your comments to the team here at Metro Self Storage! Thanks for the recommendation, and have an amazing day!

name: Sharhonda Williams
text: Aaron gave me outstanding customer service!! He went up over and beyond to insure that I got the appropriate storage unit I need!! Thanks again you rock!!

resp.text: Sharhonda, thanks for your praise and kind comments about our team. Feel free to reach out to us if you need anything. Have a wonderful day.

name: Sudaria Harris
text: I Love It Here ! Susan Is always happy and helpful when i come in ! She’s Outstanding

resp.text: Susan is outstanding! Thank you Sudaria!

name: Kiara Purifoy
text: The service was great. The young man, Aaron Brooks, was very professional, courteous, and patient. I would recommend this facility for all your storage needs.

resp.text: Kiara, thank you for your kind words and this wonderful review! Your recommendation means so much to us and we're so happy to have earned it. Have a great day

name: Faye Shaw Jenkins
text: I had a wonderful experience! Loved the attitude of Mrs. Susan. She was super helpful, professional and cheerful.

resp.text: Faye, we're glad you had such a wonderful experience with us! We are always more than happy to assist you if anything else comes up. Take care!

name: Glennie Williams
text: I love the indoor storage better than Outdoors they are much safer and much better on your furniture

resp.text: Glennie, thank you so much for the positive review! We hope you have a great day!

name: Leeana w
text: I don’t actually rent here, but I know of the services. I would just like to say that Aaron is a very very funny employee and he seems to be hardworking , outgoing and very dependable and he has a great personality . I would definitely recommend .

resp.text: Leeana, thanks for your praise and kind comments about our team. Thanks for the recommendation, and have an amazing day!

We value your feedback and would like to discuss your this with you further. When convenient, please reach out to us at (334) 270-4001 so we can help make this right.

name: Shirley Bratton
text: Thank you Susan for all your help. You provided outstanding service. Even taking time I had a unit with easy access to meet my needs. God Bless!

resp.text: Hi Shirley! We're so happy we were able to help you out! We are always more than happy to assist you if anything else comes up. Take care!

name: Jizzy Bell
text: Great place to store! I’ve been here for a while, but my only issue now is a little inconsistency. Susan (the manager) won’t let me in the office as if I’m contagious!! I feel like if Aaron let’s everyone in so can she! Everyone don’t have the CORONA!!!!!!

resp.text: We really appreciate your feedback! Thank you, and have a fantastic day!

name: Catherine Leach
text: They are always super helpful and the facility is always clean and neat!

resp.text: Catherine, we are so happy to read such a great review about Metro Storage! Feel free to reach out to us if you need anything. Have a wonderful day.

name: Joseph Freedman
text:
I am happy in all respects except one.

There is no restroom in Building A.
There used to be one, but previous
owners removed it.
No, i do NOT like to have to walk
to another building to use the
restroom.
Some of us have health (for example,
bladder and prostate) issues.
i think that you need to add a restroom
(back) to Building A.

name: sonia Gibbs
text: Ms. Susan, the manager and her staff are super professional and amazing❣️Always extremely friendly and helpful with any storage concerns I have❣️I definitely recommend Metro Self Storage for anyone who’s in need of an awesome storage facility.

resp.text: Sonia, it's experiences like yours that really keep us motivated! Your recommendation means so much to us and we're so happy to have earned it. Thank you again for taking the time to let the world know about your positive experience. Have a great day!

name: ray pugh
text: Susan gives outstanding services and support!! She is the best I’ve seen so if you’re interested in storage PLEASE COME SEE HER!!!!

resp.text: Susan is great! Thank you Ray!

name: Grace Lim
text: Susan was great and very efficient with signing me up for a storage unit. Very friendly and great customer service!

name: diane thomas
text: I came in to rent a space and Susan gave EXCELLENT service! She is very professional and I'm so glad that I stopped at this location!!

name: Eddie Davis
text: The move in was seamless. I was stuck after a moving mishap and had to get all my stuff in storage. The $1 move in was a huge incentive and Ashley at the front desk was amazing. I’d definatly recommend these guys to anyone looking for a storage facility

We value your feedback and would like to discuss your this with you further. When convenient, please reach out to us at (334) 270-4001 so we can help make this right.
